story:
Short Summary

We're JJ Delgado, Gerard Gracia and Michaela Alexis, co-authors of ThinkVideo and passionate video marketing professionals.

Over the past few years, many people have approached us to share some advice about online video and digital marketing. After two years of research, edits, and interviews, we are proud to say that we are going to release the first collaborative book about video marketing and influence, created with real practitioners from different countries, who are actively part of the evolution of the new way to relate and communicate with each other in the new digital era. 

10% of all money raised will be donated to the NGO 24friends.

Why ThinkVideo?

This book was created by creators and video campaign strategists that'll help you understand the whole online video ecosystem, and give you deep insights about how to start and what to do if you want to be a video pro, from strategy to tactics! 

ThinkVideo is a tool that will offer you a holistic and objective vision of video marketing and influencers, analyzing the evolution from television to online video, the different platforms for the diffusion of content and social video networks, the role of the influencer and their impact on the global market, the keys of the online ecosystem and the business models in relation to this new industry. We also want to offer a series of keys for those brands that are looking to start a video marketing campaign, as well as, for creators who are seeking to make their channel grow and make it profitable through advertising or the development of brand campaign.

This book is for anyone that wants to learn the secret weapons to conquer the new digital world,   and be part of this amazing worldwide project.

Who we are

  • JJ Delgado is recognized as one of the Top 15 unofficial LinkedIn influencers 2018. Selected Top 50 Worldwide Human Behaviour Experts to follow in 2017 & Most Talented Spanish Marketer 2015. Honored to have led the day with most international sales in the Amazon history. Linkedin Profile: https://www.linkedin.com/in/juanjosedelgado/
  • Gerard Gracia is founder of Vlogger Awards, the main spanish speaking awards of Video Creators, and Newvideo.xyz, the main community of Video Ninjas. He started as an Entrepreneur when he was 20, and has been quoted and published in over thirty national and international media including Forbes, El País Retina, LaSexta, for his entrepreneurial background. Linkedin Profile: https://www.linkedin.com/in/gerardgraciaarcas/
  • Michaela Alexis is a Top Linkedin Video Influencers with +100K followers. She is a native content creator. Linkedin Profile: https://www.linkedin.com/in/michaelaalexis/

Some of the ThinkVideo Top contributors are:

  • Goldie Chan: Los Angeles. +27K followers Linkedin. LinkedIn Video Influencer, Founder of Warm Robots. Featured on Forbes, Inc. Magazine, Fast Co and more.
  • Geoff Desreumaux: NYC. +20K followers Linkedin. Co-Founder, CEO, Chief Editor of We are Social Media, and Director of Social Media at Zimmerman Advertising. Top 20 Social Media Influencers
  • Brittany Hoffman: Los Angeles. Brand Management and Growth Hacker for mega influencer, Gary Vaynerchuk
  • Dr. des. Natalia Wiechowski: Germany. +45K followers Linkedin. Personal Branding Strategist

  • Daniel Rae: United Kingdom. Social media specialist with 7+ years of strategy, campaign delivery, content production, community management.
  • Zeta Yarwood: United Kingdom. Recognised as the Middle East's leading Executive Career Coach and NLP Life Coach, featured in over 20 publications worldwide.
  • Mónica Vicente: CEO Hoy no hay cole group. +5 million followers on Youtube:
    • Hoy no hay cole: https://www.youtube.com/user/Ocioeducativo
    • The Crazy Haacks: https://bit.ly/23qJeNz

 

What we need

 

In order to make this dream a reality we need to achieve 10,000$ which would help finish the book and the book printing costs.

Additional funds raised past the goal will help us to create additional projects as you can find below. The documentary will be created by Newvideoxyz, the main hub about Video Marketing & Influencing.

 

How YOU can get involved

We want to do this journey together. Supporting this campaign you will receive some unique perks as:

  • Have your name included in the last pages of the book
  • Receive a mention in a post made by one of the authors/collaborators
  • Have your name appear in the documentary
  • 1 to 1 meeting with co-authors or collaborators (60 minutes)

 

Impact

Our purpose to create this book and if we can, the additional projects, is to help and add value to anyone who wants to unlock the secrets of video marketing. 

Think Video aims to teach the history that has led to the appearance and emergence of online video and video influencing. Learn more about digital marketing, its main applications, and the key factors that define the architecture of the new ecosystem.

We are studying, analyzing and developing the different concepts from an integral perspective: valuing the internal and external team, the clients and partners, the fan community, the general public and the market.

We hope that Think Video will help to offer a map of the new digital video ecosystem, promote good practices and increase the professionalization of the industry.

As we said before, also we want to donate 10% of all money raised to 24friends (http://www.24friends.org/en/) to help cover fees, materials, uniforms and transportation to school for children, with no intermediaries involved.

 

Preface of the book

We are all transmitters and receivers of information, whether we like it or not. From the day we are born, we absorb all the information that our five senses perceive and we construct our own personality and opinion, as well as influencing the development of the people around us.

Building on this basic concept, we can say that not all sources of information or content have the same relevance during the course of a person’s life.

Humans are social beings who are curious by nature, although we form part of a society that is saturated by the impact of advertising and its content. In this ecosystem, only true experiences remain in the memory of the consumer, while all else that does not generate a connection between sender and receiver, far from the impact, is subject to remain in oblivion.

Brands and professionals can only be relevant for the consumer if they provide value, and this is where online video has positioned itself as the preferred format for users. As a brand or as a content creator, the strategy, that is, the internal configuration of a set of activities that distinguishes your brand from your competitors, will be key to achieving success.

In less than a decade, communication platforms, data analysis systems and web technology, among other factors, have completely changed the way in which we access and work with information. Despite this continuous transformation, we can identify the data, facts and investigations that allow us to establish where we come from, where we are and where we are going, taking into account all the elements that have led to this phenomenon, directly or indirectly.

The role of the consumer has definitely changed. Now, the consumer is prosumer, producer as well as consumer of content. This new paradigm arises due to the evolution of mobile phones resulting in the appearance of smartphones, the rise of telecommunications companies, the reduced cost of high quality video recording tools, the creation of applications that allow the generation and consumption of video 24/7, as well as the evolution and compression of videos that use mains platforms such as YouTube or Netflix.

The digitalization and interconnection of people has led an increasing number of companies to focus their efforts on customer centric strategies. The data suggests that the consumer connects better with video than with other formats and, despite what most people may think, the change is not confined to millennials or younger sectors of the population, but the influence of digital video has also expanded in older sectors.

The entire professional community is taking part in a theoretical-practical regeneration that, in the world of marketing, has become the main competitive difference. In the coming years, brands will fundamentally become experiences, where content will be the most interesting tool for positioning and adding reality to the brand message. This data suggests that an intense development of the video sector is imminent and, this is where Think Video aims to be a strategic and tactical pillar for all those professionals who want to implement video marketing in their organization and in the relationship with stakeholders.

 

Other ways you can help

While you might not personally be able to help, you may know someone--or people who can. Please share our story (and the link to this campaign).

story:
I am asking for financial assistance to help me achieve my dream of competing in Ironman Canada 2015.

Goal: To become an Ironman!

My story: For the past 4 years I have been competing in triathlons. I have successfully completed two half Ironman competition and last fall, I was to complete my first full Ironman in beautiful Lake Tahoe. I exhausted all of my resources, traveling 2000 miles and training at altitude for 3 weeks before the start date. Walking to the beach in my wetsuit just minutes before race start, I was faced with the harsh reality of the announcer canceling the event due to thick smoke from one of California's largest wildfires in recent history. I have set my sights on a new goal: IRONMAN CANADA 2015!

When: July 26th 2015

Where: Whistler, Canada

Qualifications:

-4,000 bike miles logged in 2014 season

-Qualified for USA Triathlon Age Group nationals for the past 3 seasons, 2012, 2013, 2014

-Ironman Kansas and Branson 70.3 finisher

-NCAA Division I swimmer

Expenses:

Travel, hotel, equipment, shoes, clothing, race fees, sport nutrition and food.

I humbly ask for your assistance to make my journey and dream of becoming an Ironman come true!

Thank you for your contribution!

story:
Encontrar literatura técnica sobre OS X en español es muy difícil debido al limitado alcance de este mercado frente al anglosajón. Desde hace ya más de un año, desde que lanzamos nuestra biblioteca Faq-mac en la iBooks Store muchas personas nos han estado pidiendo que lanzáramos un libro sobre OS X Server.

Esta no es una situación fácil, ya que un libro sobre OS X Server no sólo requiere mucho trabajo en la parte documental, sino también en la de creación y su alcance es muy limitado por lo que su precio acaba siendo, para qué el retorno de la inversión sea mínimamente razonable, alto. Y siempre he intentado evitar los precios altos. Pero una conversación en los comentarios de una noticia en faq-mac.com al respecto (otra vez) de este posible libro me ha impulsado a llevar esto a un crowdfunding,con la idea de garantizar un mínimo del retorno de la inversión sobre la titánica tarea de intentar escribir la mejor y más práctica obra sobre OS X Server del mercado en castellano, si no es la única. Y además que pueda perdurar todo lo posible en el tiempo.

El precio no lo he puesto yo, lo pusieron los lectores de www.faq-mac.com y es 29,99 euros con lo que para cumplir con el objetivo de conseguir una cantidad que me permita dedicarle 3 meses casi a tiempo completo al libro necesito al menos 2.300 euros y es una cantidad muy baja, creedme, para la cantidad de trabajo que requiere esta publicación, pero espero que gracias a las ventas adicionales en la iBooks Store se equilibre la balanza, así que yo también estoy asumiendo riesgos para intentar mantener el precio de este libro lo más controlado posible.

Si se alcanza el límite del crowdfunding, empezaré a escribir el libro en noviembre para que esté disponible a finales de enero.

Llegados a este punto vamos a hablar del libro.

El libro

"Ponte al mando de OS X Server" será ante todo una guía práctica, no descriptiva (como las muchas que hay disponibles en el mercado) orientada al usuario que no tiene idea sobre la materia pero si tiene conocimiento sobre la operación de ordenadores y redes y al prosumer, la PYME y al profesional que se estrena  con la instalación de OS X Server y el despliegue rápido de servicios.

Para el (realmente) profesional será una guía introductoria avanzada que le permitirá ponerse al día rápidamente si viene desde otros entornos. Con este público en mente, el texto del libro, así como explicaciones, vídeos y material interactivo, estará orientado a profundizar en la materia pero a hacerlo ameno, lo más fácil y comprensible posible y que todo el contenido sirva además como material de referencia a la hora de tener un problema.

Por supuesto, el libro tendrá sus correspondientes actualizaciones garantizadas durante un año, hasta la salida de OS X 10.11 Kodiak (o como lo quiera llamar Apple).

Para aquellos que ya habéis comprado uno de mis libros, la calidad y el cuidado será el mismo que en otros títulos. Para aquellos que llegan como nuevos a la biblioteca Faq-mac, prácticamente todos los títulos publicados durante nuestro primer año de existencia han llegado al número uno en ventas en la lista general de la iBooks Store y en la sección de informática, nuestra biblioteca tiene siempre colocados entre cuatro y siete libros entre los 10 primeros y las críticas en general para todos los títulos son muy favorables.

Qué recibiré con este libro si me apunto

Recibirás una copia especial de “Ponte al mando de OS X Server  - Edición Yosemite” dedicada que además contará con comentarios personales del autor sobre la preparación del libro y los dolores de cabeza durante ese periodo y cómo se han afrontado esos problemas que inevitablemente nos obsequiará Server, características que no estarán disponibles en la versión que se comercializará en la iBooks Store, además de, por supuesto, todas las actualizaciones con antelación a la versión de la iBooks Store. Sí, se que no hay pegatinas ni florituras especiales como en otros proyectos, pero quiero centrarme en lo que importa: en los contenidos y que estos sean de la mayor calidad posible.

story:
If you missed out on the campaign, you can order the eBook or the Print Book on MrExcel.com (Note: MrExcel Print Book order includes delivery of eBook).

Update: eBook delivered Nov 17th! Rest of orders expected January 2016

LAST UPDATE 2015/12/26 7PM:

eBook: All supporters who contributed at eBook or higher level, should have received an email with the eBook download links.

Printed Books: Your delivery would vary based on the perk level you contributed at.

  • Printed Book ($25/$26+Shipping): These were shipped out from Florida, on Dec 22nd or few days later and would be delivered within 2-9 days based on your location. If you have not received your order by Jan 15th leave us a comment. Thanks again for your patience.

  • Higher Level (Autographed, DAX T-Shirt etc.): We need just a little more time to put these orders together and ship them with all the cool perks you deserve. Bear with us, we'll update once these start shipping out.

Thanks for a Successful Campaign!

Thanks to all our contributors for helping is us exceed even our stretch goal of $20K!! The campaign continues as In-Demand. You can still order your printed book and eBook. 

Join the Data Revolution!

With Power Pivot in its corner, Excel is the best BI tool in the world. You know those big name, big $$, BI tools - it can kick their ass any given day. Excel + Power Pivot offer you BI that is agile and industrial strength - the best of both worlds.


NASA is just one of the companies using the magic of Excel+Power Pivot

We wrote the #1 selling Power Pivot book and have been the vanguard of the data revolution - to bring BI to all. Excel + Power Pivot brings BI to “the troops” – the frontline business users, rather than locking it away in an ivory tower that few have access to.

We call you to enlist and join the revolution. Support our cause by selecting a perk and help us self-publish the 2nd Edition of Power Pivot book in full color. Our book has already inspired thousands, but we are hoping to light a spark that spreads to the millions of Excel Pros out there.

The 2nd edition of our Power Pivot/DAX book features:

  • Current coverage of the Power BI landscape (Power BI Desktop, New DAX functions etc.)
  • Complete Edit of the whole book
  • 10 Chapters are either new or completely re-written
  • Learning Community Support by regular webinars to discuss book chapters and Q&A with authors
  • Book will be supplemented by our PowerPivotPro YouTube channel to visually explain difficult concepts and cover latest changes in Power BI

The Perks: Revolutionaries never had it so good!

Our perk levels are setup in stair-step fashion (cumulative manner), i.e. a higher level perk always includes all lower levels. For example:-

  • Buy the "Printed Book" and also get DAX Sticker, an eBook, Name in Book and Name on Website!
  • Buy the "DAX T-Shirt" and also get the DAX Poster, Rob Autograph on your book, Printed Book, DAX Sticker, an eBook, Name in Book and Name on Website!
Since a picture is worth a thousand words, here's the matrix of what you buy and what you get (click to enlarge).

Here are some pictures and information on some of the cool perks, including merchandise and haiku/limerick.


PERK: Contribute a Haiku/Limerick for the Book

I (Rob) long thought of myself as a left-brain-only guy, but about 10 years ago I started forcing myself to "exercise" my so-called right brain. Writing parody song lyrics. Quoting movies. And yes, haiku and limericks. This enhanced my enjoyment of life for sure, but also my professional capabilities. The right brain is a powerful weapon in our battle with data, because human beings are forever its focal point. And human beings love human things: warmth, humor, and softer edges make the data go down smoother.
Join me in this habit and have your work immortalized forever in a chapter dedicated to the powers of the underrated right brain. Write either a 5-7-5 syllable non-rhyming haiku or an A-A-B-B-A rhyming limerick, and we will also include your preferred "byline" attribution so that you get credit.

Two examples of haiku, and one limerick:

Risks & Challenges

Folks our minimum goal is $3,000 which would help offset the color printing costs. Our stretch goal is $20,000 which would cover the full cost of the print run.

We are choosing a flexible funding model on Indiegogo, so you will get your rewards even if we fall short of our funding goal. But you're not gonna let that happen, right!

We do face the risk that the book and therefore delivery of the perks would be delayed. Color printing is quite a bit more complicated process. We do have MrExcel (Bill Jelen) from Holy Macro Books in our corner, who is a book publishing veteran. However there may be unforeseen complications which could delay the publishing of this book. We will keep all contributors notified in such a contingency.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Please review the book on Amazon (as soon as it's released on Amazon)
  • After you have contributed, refer your friends to this campaign and earn special rewards (details announced soon but you can start sharing now). Make sure you use IndieGoGo Share tools  - the Facebook, Google Plus or Twitter icons on this Page - this lets us track your referrals.

Power on friends!
-Rob Collie, Avi Singh & Bill Jelen

Here are some pictures and information on some of the cool perks, including merchandise and haiku/limerick.



PERK: Contribute a Haiku/Limerick for the Book
I (Rob) long thought of myself as a left-brain-only guy, but about 10 years ago I started forcing myself to "exercise" my so-called right brain. Writing parody song lyrics. Quoting movies. And yes, haiku and limericks. This enhanced my enjoyment of life for sure, but also my professional capabilities. The right brain is a powerful weapon in our battle with data, because human beings are forever its focal point. And human beings love human things: warmth, humor, and softer edges make the data go down smoother.Join me in this habit and have your work immortalized forever in a chapter dedicated to the powers of the underrated right brain. Write either a 5-7-5 syllable non-rhyming haiku or an A-A-B-B-A rhyming limerick, and we will also include your preferred "byline" attribution so that you get credit.
Two examples of haiku, and one limerick:

Folks our minimum goal is $3,000 which would help offset the color printing costs. Our stretch goal is $20,000 which would cover the full cost of the print run.
We are choosing a flexible funding model on Indiegogo, so you will get your rewards even if we fall short of our funding goal. But you're not gonna let that happen, right!We do face the risk that the book and therefore delivery of the perks would be delayed. Color printing is quite a bit more complicated process. We do have MrExcel (Bill Jelen) from Holy Macro Books in our corner, who is a book publishing veteran. However there may be unforeseen complications which could delay the publishing of this book. We will keep all contributors notified in such a contingency.    Other Ways You Can Help 
Please review the book on Amazon (as soon as it's released on Amazon) After you have contributed, refer your friends to this campaign and earn special rewards (details announced soon but you can start sharing now). Make sure you use IndieGoGo Share tools  - the Facebook, Google Plus or Twitter icons on this Page - this lets us track your referrals.

story:
Nero's Fiddle brings to the forefront a threat the government doesn't want to talk about. The danger of an Electromagnetic Pulse is very real and possible. Not only a manmade attack, but a nature-made attack via solar flares from the sun.

The book also puts women heroes in the limelight. Captain Beverly Mossberg and Sedona Armstrong are two capable women, despite their human vulnerabilities. Their journey to reach Washington, DC to assassinate the terrorist before he launches an EMP attack on another country is fraught with danger, action and drama. But the journey makes both women stronger and more determined to save the world from utter and complete darkness.

Nero's Fiddle takes the reader from Decatur, Georgia to Washington, DC, mostly on foot. Along the way, the reader is witness to the worst and the best humanity has to offer. 

Nero's Fiddle has received 5-star reviews thus far. Comments such as "I couldn't put it down" and "This book holds your attention and is a very good read" and "I once wanted to be Ripley (from Aliens) now I want to be Beverly!" are found among the reviews.

It is a book that should be read by every American, if for nothing else but to gain knowledge about an Electromagnetic Pulse and what it could possibly do. Knowledge is the best way to prepare for disaster.

BE PART OF THE DREAM!

Since I was bitten by the writing bug at the age of ten kid, I have dreamed of being a successful author. And it's time to make that dream a reality.

After I survived a heart attack in June 2013, I increased my efforts to pursue that dream. 

Exactly one year after having my heart attack, I completed the rough draft of Nero's Fiddle. Nero's Fiddle is very special to me. It is the best work I have written to date.

I'm not saying that to be arrogant. There is one thing about myself in which I have utter and complete confidence: I tell a good tale and I tell it well.

Promotion and marketing is challenging for many self-published authors, myself included. Getting the word out about a book is paramount to its success. I have no doubt my dream will come to fruition, but I need some help. Which is why I decided to do an Indiegogo campaign. 

Your donation funds the creation of a professional commercial-quality book trailer, a vital tool for promotion. You'll get to see the book trailer before it launches for promotion.

If you've ever wanted your name in a book, now is your chance! Names of each and every donor will be acknowledged in Nero's Fiddle, no matter how big or how small. And there are lots of other cool rewards!

HOW CAN YOU BE A PART OF THIS DREAM?

Donations

Sharing on social media or via email.

EVERYTHING HELPS!

Not just the dollars and cents. The show of support means so much. So does getting the word out. The most challenging aspect of writing for the self-published author is exposure. Creating awareness that this book is special and worth reading. If you can't donate $1 (believe me, I've been there) then please share the links on your social media and ask all your friends to do the same. YOU NEVER KNOW WHERE IT MIGHT GO.

Synopsis of Nero's Fiddle:

When the United States is crippled by an Electromagnetic Pulse (EMP) attack, Captain Beverly Mossberg must make her way to Washington, DC to assassinate the terrorist before he strikes again.

Nero's Fiddle follows Captain Mossberg, her two children and Sedona Armstrong as they traverse a lawless land on foot. Their mission: to save the world.

FOR THOSE WHO DO NOT KNOW: An Electromagnetic Pulse is a short burst of electromagnetic energy capable of rendering any and all electronics nonfunctional. Cars, cell phones, computers: the entire power grid could be wiped out.

Here is an excerpt:


ABOUT NERO'S FIDDLE:

There has never been a woman sniper in military history. Until I took the liberty of creating one.

Captain Beverly Mossberg was a sniper during Desert Storm. As a result, she suffers from PTSD (Post Traumatic Stress Disorder). Her kids, especially her eldest, Jazmine, think she's crazy.

Sedona Armstrong is a stranger to the Mossberg family. She tosses her lot in with them when she discovers they are trekking to DC where she has a home.

The most disturbing aspect of Nero's Fiddle is that the threat of an EMP attack is very real. Not only by man. Solar flares from the sun also emit electromagnetic pulses. It is a threat which doesn't get talked about much and goes unchecked.

Nero's Fiddle brings this threat to the forefront. Making people aware of a potential threat is the beginning of their being better able to prepare themselves.

ABOUT THE SWORD OF TILK TRILOGY

Barbara Neely awakens one morning in a completely different world. Little does she know she is on the road to becoming the woman she is meant to be.

Set in the Realm of Tilk, a medieval-like world, Barbara learns she must wield the golden Sword of Tilk to defeat Balfourant, enemy of the realm. She finds her twin sister whom she hasn't seen since the age of three. 

Family history woven throughout the Trilogy brings Barbara to a crossroads: should she and her daughter remain in Tilk or return to their world?

I had just completed this Trilogy and ordered review copies on the day I had my heart attack. The story intrigued me enough to write all three books in one year.

It is a well-written, adventurous story and I am offering it, in addition to Nero's Fiddle, as part of the rewards.

Here is an excerpt:


Where the money goes:

Commercial-quality Book Trailer: $4,000 - $5,000

Promotion: $5,000 - $15,000 (depending upon donations)

Remainder: fulfillment

Thank you for participating in this crowdfunding campaign. Your support means more than you can know.

Don't forget to share the link with all your friends on social media and via email. Please encourage them to do the same.

Then go out there and make your dream happen!

Do you like nomadic handicrafts or hand-woven fabrics from Uzbekistan? Are you interested into sampling aromatic tea or exotic spices from Sri Lanka? I can find you something very special that you won’t be able to find in your local ethnic shop.

 Hi! My name is Satomi. I am a 28 year old travel blogger from Tokyo, Japan. Currently I am living the dream of traveling around the world. 

Since last summer I have been traveling for almost 1 year. I have traveled to over 20 countries now which include places like Mongolia, Russia, Iran, and Palestine. (If you’d like to know more about my travels you can check it out on my blog, goodgirlgonenomad.com)

Now that I am heading to the Mecca of nomadic handicrafts such as Uzbekistan, Nepal,India and Sri Lanka, I would like to fund my travel by buying you unique travel souvenirs from these exotic countries.

I’ve always loved ethnic things and collected retro items from the flea markets. It’s been such a pity every time I find something nice in other countries because I can’t carry everything in my backpack. That’s why I would like to buy it for you instead.

I have saved up enough money for this big trip, but now that 1 year has passed, I have used up half of my budget and still there are a few continents that I haven’t visited yet. I would appreciate your support to help me continue the dream of my life time.

Even if you can’t make a donation, you can give me a hand by sharing this on your social networks or simply come visit my website. I appreciate you reading this and hope to hear from you soon.

story:
Story of My Book

Among Fraudsters and Racketeers is an insider’s view on the day to day petty fraud and corruption that small and medium sized businesses face in many emerging markets.

I wrote this book because I wanted to share my own experiences building a business in Tanzania, East Africa, and how I learnt to handle situations of fraud and corruption.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will understand the challenges that many companies and their employees face when operating in high risk markets.

A majority of companies in emerging markets struggle to manage economic crimes including corruption practiced by government officials and the competition, and fraud committed by employees and third party.

How can small businesses handle these business risks, and yet survive and thrive? 

You will discover that while it is not easy, it is possible to build an honest company in a corrupt marketplace and thrive. In this book, I hope to instill the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for building great companies in high-risk markets, and inspire other business owners and entrepreneurs to jointly fight corruption and fraud.

In this book, you'll learn about:

  • How and why corporate employees and government officials become corrupt
  • How and why an honest person becomes a fraudster
  • How a company can set up tools and strategies that actually work against corruption and fraud, with examples from the field

You will love this book if you want to understand why people engage in these immoral business practices, and what can be done to prevent and resist this evil that hampers so many lives, businesses and economies.

Among Fraudsters and Racketeers is a non-fiction book that speaks to business managers and investors who are looking at entering high-risk markets and want to understand how they can manage risks related to common economic crimes in these markets.

Besides my own experiences, I also share interviews with auditors who have worked with multinationals as well as smaller businesses in these markets, business managers, entrepreneurs, and policy makers working in East Africa, who will offer the readers a wider perspective.

 

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press which is a hybrid publishing company. New Degree Press will help me to publish my book, and I will then own all the rights to my book. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the initial costs for publishing. Money raised will go towards the following:
 

  • The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in December 2020
  • The Cover Design of my Book - the mockups you see currently are a placeholder!
  • The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, Ebook Formats)
  • The Copyediting for My Book - to make help polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication
  • The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book - when I ultimately publish this December.

 

When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book at $25, I will publish a soft cover book. When I pre-sell 240 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition. When I pre-sell 320 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition and an audiobook.

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish
  • A personal, handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering my book
  • Your name will appear in a Special, Acknowledgements section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”)
  • Early access to the Introduction of my Book and my entire manuscript, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback
  • The opportunity to help give me feedback and be involved in selecting my cover
  • I will do a book topic/workshop seminar where I will share experience the experiences of writing my book

 

About the Author

Marie Englesson is the founder of Atsoko, a beauty retail company in Tanzania that she started in 2012, and then scaled up during six years. Atsoko became the leading beauty chain in Tanzania with seven stores, and Marie sold the business in 2018.

Marie has a MSc in Business and Economics from the Stockholm School of Economics, and an executive education from Stanford Graduate School of Business. Before starting Atsoko, Marie worked several years in supply chain and procurement for global telecom across Africa, Asia, Latin America and Europe. Now she is an advisor to startups, PE funds and larger consumer companies in East Africa alongside developing new ventures. Today, Marie spends her time between Nairobi, Kenya and Stockholm, Sweden.

Marie wrote this book as she wanted people to understand how things really are on the ground for managers and employees of smaller businesses in emerging and high risk markets. This book can serve as an executive education on how to build and manage am honest and good company in an ugly business environment and help other entrepreneurs, investors, business managers be better prepared to resist and prevent economic crime in these markets.

For more information you can connect with Marie at marie.englesson@gmail.com and Linkedin.

 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to all readers in Sweden within each pre-order tier. If you want to order a book to be delivered outside of Sweden, please contact me directly and I will arrange the shipping for you at no extra cost.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Please Share my Pre-sale Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #amongfraudstersandracketeers and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press so we can help amplify your efforts.
  • You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page
  • Please share my book to 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or Direct Message on social media.

Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
Marie Englesson

story:
THE PONYTAIL SWIM CAP 

 Lookin' Good!

EASY ON/EASY OFF
The Ponytail Swim Cap is a patent-pending three panel cap with a reinforced hole in the center panel for a ponytail. It’s really easy to put on. You just put your hair in a ponytail, pull the cap over your head like you would a regular hat and then reach back and pull your ponytail through the hole. Virtually no tucking or pulling! 

BENEFITS REPORTED BY SWIMMERS 
  • Provides superior comfort 
  • Eliminates ugly hair bumps 
  • Reduces cranial pressure and swim headaches 
  • Easy to put on and take off 
  • Hooks onto a carabiner for easy access and quick drying 
  • Virtually no tucking or pulling 
  • No ride ups or pop offs 
  • Extra drag for a more effective practice 
  • Creates a cool new look 
  • Fits under a bike helmet so triathletes can transition smoothly 
  • Keeps head warm or cool depending on the fabric used 
  • A great "No Cry" cap for little swimmers who need to keep their bangs out of their eyes during lessons, but who don't want to put on a painful cap!

story:
Short Summary

The moment our doctor told us that we'd lost our daughter Priscilla at 20 weeks of pregnancy, I never thought we would see such light, hope and ultimately life come from her story. But we did! As I wrote the story of her life, her twin sister Tabitha's miraculous healing and all that Jesus taught us during our journey, I realized this story was not just for us. There was Truth hidden in those days between Priscilla's death and Tabitha's birth. This story will bring hope and healing to all those who have dealt with sorrows and help readers to recognize such miracles found in their own lives.

What We Need & What You Get

When we were researching publishing options we learned that going a traditional publishing route gave away our rights to the distribution and publishing of this story. So, in order to make this book available to anyone and everyone who might benefit from it, we have decided to self publish. To get this book from manuscript to print we have several more steps to complete: Professional editing, cover design, copy and cover edits and purchase of ISBN rights. Now that we've reached our goals to cover these costs, we will use any additional contributions for publicity and reaching a larger audience once the book goes on sale. 

This costs money! But we are opening up ways for you to help this book reach publication by providing a few really great ways for you to donate to this cause, and also give you a few extra perks when the book comes to print.

Impact 

One of the mysteries of Jesus' death on the cross, is that He chose to die on a Friday and come back to life on a Sunday. A whole day between. And not just any day. It was a Sabbath day, and his followers were essentially force into sitting and waiting, unable to do anything to distract them from the loss of their Lord. 

But we learned through our own experiences with Twin-to-Twin Transfusion back in 2012,  our own personal day between, that those days between Death and Life can hold the power to teach us and shape us and draw us to a closer relationship with Jesus. 

This book goes into all the glorious details of our journey, telling of the lessons we learned, the miracles we witnessed and the people and events that shaped who we became. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

 Just because you may not be able to contribute financially, doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Please share this site on your social media accounts (the Indiegogo share tools are easy to use). The more people to see it, the more likely we will reach our goal! 
  • Please pray for this project as we work to get it published, and also pray for the impact it will have once it is in print.

Short Summary
The moment our doctor told us that we'd lost our daughter Priscilla at 20 weeks of pregnancy, I never thought we would see such light, hope and ultimately life come from her story. But we did! As I wrote the story of her life, her twin sister Tabitha's miraculous healing and all that Jesus taught us during our journey, I realized this story was not just for us. There was Truth hidden in those days between Priscilla's death and Tabitha's birth. This story will bring hope and healing to all those who have dealt with sorrows and help readers to recognize such miracles found in their own lives.

What We Need & What You Get
When we were researching publishing options we learned that going a traditional publishing route gave away our rights to the distribution and publishing of this story. So, in order to make this book available to anyone and everyone who might benefit from it, we have decided to self publish. To get this book from manuscript to print we have several more steps to complete: Professional editing, cover design, copy and cover edits and purchase of ISBN rights. Now that we've reached our goals to cover these costs, we will use any additional contributions for publicity and reaching a larger audience once the book goes on sale.

story:
Introduction: 

Krystina Renae Rankin is an author of inspirational romance. Her debut novel, Worthy of Redemption, is a story of love, friendship, and forgiveness. With your help, she can finally realize her dream of publishing a book and sharing this story. 

 

How the money will be used:

The money raised through this campaign will be used in the following ways:

  • Editing services
  • Cover design and book layout
  • Publication fees (ISBNs, copyright, library of congress registration)
  • Distribution (Amazon and IngramSpark set up, printing and shipping fees)
  • Any additional funds will go towards marketing costs

 

 

More information:

Brief book description: 

Ten years after the tragic death of her friend Victoria, Ashlynn Wilson returns home to Whitelake, Texas to help with her ailing father.  She is immediately forced to confront Dr. Heath Lancaster, the man she holds responsible for Victoria’s death.  As she watches Heath care for her ill father, she sees a compassionate man of faith rather than the teenage boy who made poor decisions. 

​Heath Lancaster has never forgiven himself for his girlfriend’s death and neither has his former classmate.  With Ashlynn back in town, Heath seeks to prove to them both that he’s a man worthy of redemption.  

 

For an example of Krystina's writing, here's a link to a short story: 

https://www.krystinarenaerankin.com/blog/something-different

Blog post about the journey to the decision to self-publish: 

https://www.krystinarenaerankin.com/blog/a-dream-coming-true

 

 

Follow Krystina online:

  • Website:  https://www.krystinarenaerankin.com
  • Twitter: @krystinarenae
  • Instagram: @krystinarenaerankin
  • Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/krystinarenaerankin/

 

 

Other ways you can help:

  • Prayer! This journey will be both physically and emotionally stressful. Please join me in prayer for financial favor, peace about whatever happens, and ultimately, that God be glorified through this novel.
  • Sharing! Share this campaign on social media, through email, and good old fashioned word of mouth.

story:
THE IDEA

With the 50 year Jubilee of the Apollo 11 Moonlanding, i wanted to publish a new interpretation of the paperback "In this Decade / Mission to the Moon", first published in 1969. 

This is the second edition, i optimized the Cover with a softtouch Cover for a nice haptic surface feeling, changed the paper inside and made some corrections to text & typography. There are two additional editions with Slipcase: Silver and Gold Edition

We choose to go to the Moon! We choose to go to the Moon in this decade and do the other things, not because they are easy, but because they are hard; because that goal will serve to organize and measure the best of our energies and skills, because that challenge is one that we are willing to accept, one we are unwilling to postpone, and one we intend to win, and the others, too. John F. Kennedy // 12.09.1962

IN THIS DECADE.. THE ORIGINAL PAPERBACK

The original Paperback of "In this decade.." has 48 pages and the Foldout Chart of the "Lunar Landing Mission Profile"  My new Hardcover Book has 160 pages with stitch binding, shows and describes the most important Milestones of all Apollo Missions, from Nr. 1 to Nr. 17! I optimized the Lunar Landing Profile and added the Graphic of the Apollo Lunar Landing Sites.

My own original Paperback from 1969... with the unfolded Lunar Landing pages.

The restored Lunar Landing Poster 21x84cm comes with every book!

The Voyager Golden Records are two phonograph records that were included aboard both Voyager spacecraft launched in 1977.  The records contain sounds and images selected to portray the diversity of life and culture on Earth. The Sticker 21x21cm comes with the Gold Edition.

WHAT YOU GET: The Book Editions

I offer three Editions:

  • #Basic: Basic is the book with the Lunar Folding Poster

  • #Silver: Silver is the basic Edition, with a fantastic Slipcase made from heavy Cardboard and a silver cover. This slipcase has really a moonlike feeling! In addition you will get 10 silver Postcards with quotes from Carl Sagan, Arthur C. Clarke and Stephen Hawking.

  • #Gold: Gold is the basic Edition, with a fantastic Slipcase made from heavy Cardboard and a golden cover. This slipcase has really a moonlike feeling! In addition you will get 10 silver Postcards with quotes from Carl Sagan, Arthur C. Clarke and Stephen Hawkingand, 10 Postcards with Vintage space motifs. Plus the golden Carl Sagan Record Plate as gold foiled Sticker in 21x21 cm.

The Basic Edition. 160 pages, Hardcover, 21,5 x 21,5 cm,  135grams fine glossy paper for optimized picture prints. Softtouch Cover, Stitch binding, Head / Tailband.

The Silver & Gold Edition with a special slipcase and Addons!

The Slipcases are made from heavy cardboard and covered with a special material like a metal surface with embossed typography. It's especially made in a German Bookbindery!

Silver PostcardSet: These 10 Vintage Postcards with great photography from the past, with space quotes of Carl Sagan, Stephen Hawking and Arthur C. Clarke are printed on 300g silver Cardboard and have a wonderful shiny look. They come with the Silver & Gold Edition in a silver cardboard envelope.

10 Space Retro Postcards are printed on 300g Vintage Cardboard and have a wonderful vintage look. They come on top with the Gold Edition in a silver cardboard envelope.

The golden Record Plate of Carl Sagan as golden Sticker 21 x 21 cm (only with Gold Edition)

THE BOOK CONTENT:

Layout: The Text-Layout is made with two columns for optimized reading. The images are all in full size and are all restored and if neccessary, retouched.

The chapters: For each Apollo mission, you will find a single chapter with crew and mission milestones. In every chapter you will find rare images of the mission and specified informations.

Space Art & Special Photography: I selected a lot pf paintings and drawings, that were especially made during the missions and mixed them with photographs of the missions.

The first man on the moon: The historical paperback "In this decade.." describes in detail the landing process and a lot of very personal communications between the astronauts and the NASA ground control. This is really exciting!

What did they find on the moon? Soil... some details about the samples they took from the moon surface and what happend with that stuff on earth..

The lunar Module: See the best images of the crews and the inside of the lunar module..

Technical Graphics: I selected and restored some graphics of the command module and also graphics from the original press kits. They are sorted to the missions.

Astronaut Photography: There are thousands of film magazines of the astronauts. I tried to figure out the best ones..

The early Space-Suites and a special Christmas Dinner: The simple drawings and the simplicity of the food is really fascinating. Not to compare with todays missions...

Apollo Mission Analyzers: Rare stuff, the Mission Analyzers with turnable scales for detailed information of every mission day.. (only shown in the book ; )

Famous Photographs: The best images from the Apollo missions, like this one from Apollo 9, when "Scott" took a look out the LM.

Space Art: The best Space Artists are featured in this Book: Starting with Alan Bean, who sadly passed away last year. I emailed personally with him before and i could get his permission to show some of his Artworks.

Charles Wilp, famous Advertiser, Photographer and "ARTronaut", who sent his Artworks around the world with the Columbia D2 flight. I met him several times in the 90ies for an ESA/DLR Project where i was working.

Ed Hengeveld. A fantastic painter from the Netherlands, who has painted a lot of the NASA Astronauts and also draw great stories and pictures of the missions.

You will find some more space art in the book and also on the additional Postcard Sets of the Silver & Gold Edition.

Hope you like this book and thanks a lot for backing! Cheers, Tim.

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

 

SHIPPING

Shipping will start in October! We ship worldwide with Post Switzerland, EU with Post France, Germany with DPD. We ship without Tracking, so the shipping rates can be lowered to a minimum. If a parcel gets lost, it's lost. Makes no difference if you have a tracking. If a book comes in damage and you take it, no insurance will pay this. So insurance makes no sense either. It's better to resend a book. Meanwhile we sent more than 1500 books in more than 30 countries and had only a loss of two books in Asia and one in the US. The packaging is very strong and the books are foiled and inside bubble wrapped.

 :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::

CREDITS & THANKS TO:
NASA / JPL /
ESA / DLR COLOGNE
ALAN BEAN / BUZZ ALDRIN 
LIBRARY OF CONGRESS 
I. SCHMIDT-WINKELER CHARLES WILP

:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::

SOME BACKER REVIEWS:

The box in silver edition is just stunning! The texture of the paper is just perfect for suggesting the moon's surface. Thanks Tim for this wonderful project! / I received my copy and it's absolutely beautiful! I haven't opened the wrap as it's a Christmas gift but I'm blown away. / Got my book the other day; it is fantastic! / Everything looks great. And warmest compliments for this project / I received my Silver Edition book today in the mail - thank you. Nice quality of printing and all that.... to be continued..

story:
Seed Money: From Doubt to Clout

A book about adversity, entrepreneurship and a portfolio mindset. 

My name is Carole Sprunk and I am the author of Seed Money: From Doubt to Clout. I wrote this book because I wanted to share stories from my adverse childhood as a source of inspiration and encouragement for my friends and family. That no matter what obstacle you face, you can achieve your goals. 

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover your own passion.

I want you to see this book as an opportunity to grow and become successful, escape from your comfort zone and learn alongside me as I strive for success. 

In this book, you'll encounter multifaceted dimensions of adversity, entrepreneurship and passion. You will also uncover unique ways to grow your own diverse revenue stream:

* In my early childhood I came home from school to find that my home was gone. Our trailer had been repossessed and our short term normal was living in a garage. It didn't last long fortunately, however the events after that spiraled out of control and I ended up getting taken away from my home. 

* I married at 20 and had my first child before I was 21. Being a good mom was always important to me. Losing most of my family in my twenties made getting ahead even more difficult. As I turned 30, I felt compelled to do more than live paycheck to paycheck. I also wanted purpose for my children. 

* Presently, I am a majority owner of 3 businesses. I've diversified my income opportunity. I look for ways to leverage my businesses to create new streams of income. I anticipate being able to not only use my bits of seed money to grow my own family's wealth but look forward to the opportunity to help the next hungry person up the ladder. 

You will love this book if you love a good come back story in progress. Seed Money speaks to entrepreneurs, gritty people and dreamers. People who want more but not yet sure where to start.

Ultimately, I hope that this book encourages discussion about your next side hustle. What sets your soul on fire and keeps you up at night. Does it earn you money yet? It can. 

This book is divided into 3 parts:

Part 1 is a recollection of my adverse childhood. 

Part 2 are my young, child raising adult years.

Part 3 I finally get my shit together and start hustling. 

 

What I Need & What You'll Get


This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:
 

The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in [Month, Year]

The Cover Design of my Book - the mockups you see currently are a placeholder!

The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, Ebook Formats)

The Copyediting for My Book - to make help polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication

The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book - when I ultimately publish this winter

When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition and an audiobook.


I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

A personally signed copy of my book when I publish

A personal, handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering my book

Your Name will appear in a Special, Acknowledgements Section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”)

Early access to the Introduction of my Book and some additional sections of my manuscript, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback

The opportunity to help give me feedback and be involved in selecting my cover

I will do a book topic/workshop seminar where I will share experience the experiences of writing my book

And more...

About the Author


Carole Sprunk is a serial entrepreneur. She stepped out of her comfort zone to buy a niche magazine and soon launched her own brand of coffee. 

Carole wrote this book to grab the attention of those who want something more. Specifically, those who've overcome some challenges and constantly get knocked down but still keep getting up. 

When Carole isn't thinking of the next big business opportunity she loves a good dram of bourbon and hosting friends for food and drinks. 

For more information you can connect with Carole Sprunk at Carole.Sprunk@gmail.com and on LinkedIn at https://www.linkedin.com/in/carolesprunk/

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Please Share my Pre-sale Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #SeedMoney and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press so we can help amplify your efforts.

You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page

Please share my book to 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or Direct Message on social media.

Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
Carole Sprunk

story:
Story of My Book

Finding My Twenty-Five reveals dynamic opportunities of living in your twenties and how to create new opportunities during any decade of our life.

My name is Wayne Beck and I am the author of Finding My Twenty-Five. I wrote this book to shine light on the benefits of living in your twenties and carrying on with those benefits throughout life. I also hope to encourage teens who want to get a jumpstart on accomplishing great things.

My hope is that in this book you will learn to break free of any shackles that may be holding you back from what you really want to accomplish or be, and at any age.

In this book, you'll learn about finding freedom in your life from such stories as...
  • How a career federal agent leaves his career to free child sex slaves throughout the world.
  • Four electrical engineering graduates rented a prune drying shed, then revolutionized the human resource management throughout Silicon Valley and the high-tech industry throughout the country.
  • A six-year-old rape victim reshaped her life through several tragedies. In her sixties, she became a television celebrity, one of the top twenty female authors of all time and she offered new hope to millions of fans.

You will love this book if you want to break free from anything that might be holding you back from the path you want to follow. You will be inspired by others to see clearly who you are more clearly and find that you are your own best teacher.

Finding My Twenty-Five is a non-fiction book that speaks to any twenty-something who wants to change the world, or anyone in their thirties, forties, fifties, sixties and beyond who wants to find the freedom to keep reaching new heights. With greater confidence, teens will find that they really can overcome anything and fulfill their dreams.

 

The Book - Finding My Twenty-Five

Part 1, the Introduction and Chapters 1-4 describe the benefits of being a twenty-something, showing extraordinary resilience and capacity to impact the world. One example shows how a medical student founded a non-profit that funds diabetes research and then saved a family business, which ultimately is funding his education.

Part 2, Chapters 5-8 shows how people rise to the occasion to overcome great difficulties and continue on a productive path. You will see how a young boy overcame racial segregation, rose to become a Super Bowl champion, suffered many ups and downs and at age 69, was elected to the U.S. Congress.

Part 3, Chapters 9-13 demonstrate how key elements of the twenty-something’s advantages can come together to find pathways to success no matter what happens around them. Those primary elements teach the importance of applying mentors in your life. You will learn about a child who overcame health problems, then put aside his career path to join his brothers to save his dad's company when his dad's health began to fail. He also served as a mentor to his employees.

 

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

  • The editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in April, 2021.
  • The cover design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)
  • The layout design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).
  • The copy editing for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.
  • The launch & promotion efforts for my book when I ultimately publish in Spring 2021.

When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish a paperback and ebook. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition and an audiobook.

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish.
  • Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book.
  • You will receive early access to the Introduction and other excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review them and give me early feedback.
  • You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.
  • You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.
  • And much more!

About the Author

Wayne Beck has been an observer his whole life. He is a 33-year veteran police officer that worked in both city and university settings. On the frontlines, he is deeply familiar with life's challenges and traumas, and with courageous triumphs and success.

He wrote this book to spotlight tremendous opportunities and advantages available to twenty-somethings and to demonstrate that those opportunities and advantages are available to people of all ages.

Wayne lives among the mountains of Utah and enjoys hiking and jogging trails. He has four children and seven grandchildren with his wife, Jenny. They are always maintaining and upgrading their 100-year plus home and taking care of the surrounding orchard and garden.

For more information, you can connect with Wayne Beck at www.findingmy25.com, waynebeck@findingmy25.com, on LinkedIn as Wayne Beck, Instagram @wlbecks, Twitter @lorenzobeck, and on Facebook as Wayne L Beck

 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by including the cost of mailing and shipping the signed copies into each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we ship the pre-order rewards to you as early as possible. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as to when my book will publish. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Please share my pre-sale campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #findingmytwentyfive and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so that we can help amplify your efforts.

You can easily share my pre-sale campaign via Indiegogo at the top of the page.

Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it via text or direct message on social media.

Thank you so much for all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
Wayne Beck

story:
Short Summary

In Pennies From Jude (formerly Pennies from Montgomery), Jen Carroll didn’t ask for her confusing life to become a nightmare, but when she seeks advice from a charismatic priest, he unwittingly sends her down a path that triggers chaos and the dark secrets surrounding the suicide of her childhood friend, Jude. 


My name is Keri Vornadore and I am the author of Pennies From Jude. I wrote this novel because I wanted to show how important it is for a young person to think for themselves, rather than blindly accepting the beliefs of others. Internalizing others’ perceptions of who we are, rather than questioning, can lead to mental health problems. This is exactly what Jen Carroll, the protagonist, does. She is distrustful of her own mind and she relies on external sources to tell her what to believe. 


I’ve read countless books on mental health, and what I have found is that the subconscious mind is critical in understanding how people tick. Did you know that 95% of your life is controlled by your subconscious beliefs, which form during childhood? What you take to be “true” on a subconscious level becomes true. That is why it's important to think for yourself, or else you could live your life on someone else's terms. Jen Carroll's outer life reflects the negative beliefs she formed as a child, but she re-defines them after hitting rock bottom. Failures are just opportunities to reconstruct ourselves. I know so because I wouldn't have written this incredible story if I hadn't!


This book was inspired by my desire to blend self-help principles, such as thinking for yourself and forming empowering self-beliefs, into a compelling fictional story that can help any person. Although this book is fiction, it is based on substantial fact and real events that still affect people. 

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover that it is up to you to decide who you are and what you believe in. In this book, I hope to instill the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for mental health in you. And then ultimately I want you to see this book as a tool to help you discover how influence and belief can be a catapult towards self-worth and success. 

The Book - Pennies From Jude


The book is written in 3 Parts...

Part [1] You will meet the protagonist Jen Carroll and secondary characters Ruth Fischer, and Father Kellam. 

Part [2] You will meet the dysfunctional Carroll family, and learn about how Jude Sinclair’s death shaped all of their lives.

Part [3] After learning the heartbreaking events of Jude’s life, Jen and her older brother Sal go on a mission to their old neighborhood.

Part [4] In a shocking plot twist Jen realizes all of the lies she has been told. But just before she declares revenge, Jude appears to her one last time to tell her something.
 

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:
 

The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in July 2020

The Cover Design of my Book - the mockups you see currently are a placeholder!

The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, Ebook Formats)

The Copyediting for My Book - to help polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication

The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book - when I ultimately publish this summer.


When I pre-sell 100 copies of my book, I will publish. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish an audiobook. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition.

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book NOW:

You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish

A Personal, handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering my book

Your Name will appear in a Special, Acknowledgements Section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”)

Early access to the Introduction of my Book and my entire manuscript, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback

The opportunity to help give me feedback and be involved in selecting my cover

I will do a book topic/workshop seminar where I will share experience the experiences of writing my book

And more...

About the Author


Keri Vornadore is a student at the College of William and Mary aspiring to go into the publishing industry. She grew up in the Outer Banks of North Carolina, running her family's restaurants with her four older siblings. She played Division 1 Soccer at Old Dominion University before transferring to William and Mary. Keri has been writing fiction stories for fun since she was in elementary school, and now she wants to use her experiences to help others.

Keri is a voracious reader and would read for a living if it were possible. Her friends and teammates describe her as energetic, passionate and humorous.  Her biggest heroes are Abraham Lincoln, Napoleon Hill and the entire United States Women's National Soccer Team.

For more information, you can connect with Keri at kpvornadore@email.wm.edu and @KeriVornadore on Twitter, Keri Vornadore on Facebook.

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Please Share my Pre-sale Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #PenniesFromJude and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press so we can help amplify your efforts.

You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page

Please share my book to 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or Direct Message on social media.

Thank you so much of all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
Keri Vornadore
