story:
Breve reseña

Este es uno de los proyectos que se suman a la agenda de transformación que están impulsando las nuevas generaciones de profesionales en el país. Propongo que realicemos juntos la primera Encuesta Ciudadana financiada de forma directa en la historia de México. Se trata de una encuesta nacional apartidista e independiente pagada por la gente para la gente. Ante la falta de encuestas confiables, el objetivo es que generemos información fidedigna de cara a la elección del 7 de junio, un elemento fundamental para tomar una buena decisión a la hora de ir a votar.

La encuesta la realizaremos un equipo de investigadores con amplia experiencia en este campo. El Consejo Técnico se conforma por académicos de renombre que participarán en el diseño del instrumento. (Federico Estévez (ITAM), Vidal Romero (ITAM), Alejandro Moreno (ITAM), José Merino (ITAM/CIDE) y Alejandro Poiré (TEC))

Lo que necesitamos y lo que obtienes

Necesitamos reunir $221,200 pesos (14,200 DLS) para poder levantar la encuesta. El monto total se destinará al levantamiento de campo de las encuestas y a pagar las comisiones de la plataforma Indiegogo. Si rebasáramos la meta de manera tal que alcanzara para hacer una sobremuestra en el DF, destinaríamos el sobrante para este fin. Si no hubiera suficiente dinero para ello, aumentaríamos el número de casos para la nacional si valiera la pena y/o pagaríamos los servicios del equipo de investigación. 

Recompensas:

La publicación del dato electoral se llevará a cabo el miércoles 27 de mayo y lo podrán conocer todos los ciudadanos, hayan aportado o no. Se publicará en la fan page de Facebook (Encuesta Ciudadana). 

Además en la página web que está en construcción, aparecerán los nombres de todos los que aporten al proyecto.

Aporte hasta 500 pesos: Reporte de resultados de la encuesta.

Aporte entre 501 y 1,000 pesos: Reporte de resultados y base de datos de variables electorales, más variables de un módulo, a elegir. Además se elaborará un libro digital con los resultados. En este libro aparecerán los nombres de los que aporten a la encuesta.

Aporte entre 1,001 y 5,000 pesos: Reporte de resultados, base de datos de módulos a elegir (Uno por cada mil pesos). 

Aporte entre 5,001 y 9,999 pesos: Reporte de resultados, base de datos de módulos a elegir (uno por cada mil pesos), y Mención como Cofundador.

Aporte de 10,000 pesos o más: Reporte y base de datos completa, y Mención como Cofundador.

*Se entregarán las recompensas en los días posteriores a la elección del 7 de junio de 2015.

El impacto

En los últimos años las encuestadoras han presentado problemas de confiabilidad erosionando la democracia y el avance científico. 
Mi propuesta es hacer una encuesta fidedigna y sin sesgos para tomar mejores decisiones a la hora de votar.
Por nuestra democracia debemos generar un nuevo tipo de información, más veraz y neutral.
Ahora somos los ciudadanos los que debemos actuar y construir una encuesta cuyo objetivo fundamental no sea desinformar sino entender verdaderamente cómo viene la elección.
Además, la encuesta servirá para producir conocimiento científico, pues se trata de que los académicos participantes (tanto en el Consejo Técnico como los que realicen aportaciones), analicen los resultados y publiquen eventualmente artículos científicos.

Riesgos y desafíos

El mayor desafío es que la gente participe por la causa democrática. Sin embargo, en los últimos meses hemos visto a la sociedad movilizándose en todo el país, así que esperamos que esa concientización sirva de estímulo para apoyar este proyecto.

Para superar el reto, durante las semanas de recaudación haremos una campaña intensa entre la comunidad académica y la opinión pública en general.

Otras formas en las que puedes ayudar

Buscaremos algunos espacios de difusión pero lo más importante serán nuestras redes sociales, así que comparte el proyecto con tus amigos y seguidores.

Indiegogo también cuenta con herramientas para compartir el proyecto. 

!Úsalas y ayúdanos a difundir!

story:
UPDATE 5

We are 95% funded! We can now announce stretch goals. If we reach $9,000 we will feature 7 illustrations in the book (maybe more!), all by talented women artists. So keep swimming team squid!

UPDATE 4

New reward! Angela Slatter is offering signed copies of her two short-story collections plus a short story critique. Pledge $100 for the Australian Squid and get this reward.

UPDATE 3

Supper of the Damned! Have dinner with Silvia Moreno-Garcia and a bunch of crazy Lovecraftian writers during the HPL Film Fest or World Horror (either event works for us). Plus, you get a random package of IFP goodies (Future Lovecraft, Innsmouth Magazine 14, perhaps an enchanted donut, etc) delivered to you during this supper of the damned! Being with the cool kids was never easier. Coolness not guaranteed.

UPDATE 2

New reward! Canadian artist Kaden Harris has donated an electric kalimba! The handmade 6 note electric kalimba, made of oiled walnut with cymbal bronze tines, makes a lovely present for music lovers. Here's a picture of one of Kaden's kalimbas.


UPDATE 1

Photo of an ukulele hand-crafted by Karina Melendez. Our Deluxe reward includes your own CUSTOM ukulele. You pick the colours and work with Karina to get a strange and bizarre musical instrument.


Lovecraft! Women! Squids! Writers take on the challenge of an aeon. Gemma Files. Angela Slatter. Ann. K Schwader.They gather to prove that chicks dig Cthulhu.

Of Squids and Women

Do girls just not like to play with squids? That's the question an editor asked on Facebook. What followed was a long discussion on Lovecraftian fiction and women. And the need for an answer.

The answer: Women do write Lovecraftian fiction. We aim to prove it with your support. More than a dozen female authors have gathered to write original Lovecraftiana and place it in a single volume under the title She Walks In Shadows. Some of the writers who have accepted the challenge are:

  • Laura Blackwell writing Mrs. Herrero ("Cool Air")
  • Nadia Bulkin writing Nabby Gardner (“The Colour Out of Space”)
  • S.J. Chambers to tackle Eunice Babson (“The Thing On The Doorstep”)
  • Carrie Cuinn writing Anna Tilton (“The Shadow Over Innsmouth”)
  • Arinn Dembo writing the Ape Princess (“Facts Concerning the Late Arthur Jermyn and His Family”
  • Gemma Files writing Marceline (“Medusa’s Coil”)
  • Nelly Geraldine Garcia-Rosas writing T’la-yub (“The Mound”)
  • Lyndsey Holder writing Keziah Mason (“Dreams in the Witch House”)
  • Sharon Mock writing Shub-Niggurath (of many, many stories).
  • Ann. K Schwader contributing poetry (Ammutseba, original Mythos entity)
  • Angela Slatter writing Lavinia Whateley (“The Dunwich Horror”)
  • Benjanun Sriduangkaew writing Pth'thya-l'yi or Shub-Niggurath
  • Molly Tanzer writing Asenath ("The Thing on the Doorstep")
  • E. Catherine Tobler writing Lady Margaret Trevor (“The Rats in Walls”)
  • Wendy Wagner writing Nitocris (“The Outsider” and “Imprisoned with the Pharaohs”.)
  • Cynthia Ward writing Mother Hydra (“Dagon” and “The Shadow Over Innsmouth”)
We seek to pay 6 cents a word to contributors. All funds go towards that goal. If we publish 80,000 words of fiction we'd need $4,800 to pay everyone. And there are other production costs: mailing prizes, design, etc.We can't do it without you.

What We Need & What You Get

Our #teamsquid mascot is provided courtesy of Lisa Grabenstetter and will appear on our buttons! Yes, buttons.

Pledge $50 or more and get a lovely squid t-shirt, too.


Pledge $50 or more and you get a one-year subscription of the magazine The Dark, courtesy of Sean Wallace and Jack Fisher from Prime Books (plus issues 1-3!).

Go Giant Squid and get the anthology in *hardcover.*

But that is not all! Writers, artists and editors are offering several packaged goodies for your consumption, including:

  • Monstrosities Package (thanks Cameron Pierce)
  • Sexy Cthulhu Package (thanks Steve Berman)
  • Omnium Gatherum Package (thanks Ennis Drake)
  • Lady Cthulhu Package (thanks Carrie Cuinn)
  • Dreamy Cthulhu Package (thanks David C. Kopaska-Merkel)
  • Artsy Lovecraft Package (thanks Cindy Lewis)
  • Weird Package (thanks Michael Kelly)
  • Stone Skin (thanks Stone Skin Press)
  • Eldritch Steampunk Squid (thanks S.J. Chambers )
  • Erich Zann Package (thanks Darkest of the Hillside Thickets and Ah Pook The Destroyer)
  • Deluxe Squid (thanks to Karina Melendez)
  • NEW: Kalimba Squid (thanks to Kaden Harris)


When?

This anthology will be produced by Innsmouth Free Press, maker of bizarre books, and delivered in the fall of 2015. Help us kickstart the squid revolution!

Who? 

The squid editors:
Silvia Moreno-Garcia is a writer and editor of many bizarre things. Dead North, the Canadian zombie anthology, was her latest project. Her debut collection This Strange Way of Dying was released in 2013. Her debut novel Signal to Noise will be released by Solaris in 2015. She blogs at http://silviamoreno-garcia.com/blog/

Paula R. Stiles is a random citizen of the world who has sold SF, fantasy and horror to Strange Horizons and Writers of the Future, among others. She also has published a cowritten mystery/SF novel, Fraterfamilias and a non-fiction book of medieval history, Templar Convivencia: Templars and Their Associates in 12th and 13th Century Iberia. She is the author of the urban fantasy novel The Mighty Quinn. You can find her at: http://thesnowleopard.net.

The squid artist: Lisa Grabenstetter
A Washington DC native with a degree in traditional printmaking, Lisa is also know for weird art and a slightly unsettling fixation on books, monsters, and birds. To learn more, see http://magneticcrow.com


FAQ

I want to write a story for you! Can I?
Although we have several authors who have accepted the challenge and we hope they will all deliver squidly stories, we'll have an open reading period. Wait for it.

I want to draw something for you!
We'll be happy to look at portfolios if the book gets funded. :)

Who's behind this?
Silvia Moreno-Garcia, publisher of Innsmouth Free Press, is organizing this IndieGoGo.

story:
Let me first thank you for taking the time to view my campaign! 

My name is Mike Balmaceda and I will be explaining to you my dream of creating the Kindle Publishing Playbook Video Series which will help anyone successfully write and publish the book of their dreams.


What is Kindle Publishing? Why is it Important?

  Kindle Publishing is a proven system that gives anyone a shot at becoming a successful author and publisher due to the publishing system and traffic that Amazon provides to its products; given you have the skills to pull off writing and publishing a book.  Given this, I’ve found much success in the Kindle publishing system described in my video series and have shared these methods to help many others spread their passion and stories worldwide.  It is also often considered fulfilling a life goal when publishing a book containing ideals or stories that touch your heart or you are passionate about.  Please consider fulfilling my dream to help others spread their passions, dreams, and stories through publishing.


The Kindle Publishing Playbook Series and Why I’m creating it

  The Kindle Publishing Playbook video series is a complete, comprehensive guide to teach anyone, regardless of previous writing  experience, publishing experience,  computer experience, or income, how to publish a book step-by-step, successfully.  A common misconception when publishing books surrounds the opinion that you need a publisher or a very complex pre-launch plan. Wrong! The Kindle Publishing Playbook Series contains multiple videos that take the reader through an introduction of the platform, creating the book, self-publishing it, marketing their books, and much more. Creating this will allow me to spread my story and unique methods to a large audience, allowing more individuals the opportunity to write and publish books and achieve financial success. I’ve read over 8000 pages of content, watched over 50 hours of video, listened to over 25 hours of audio and more. Combining to over 7 months of hard work, I’ve spent the time developing the ultimate strategy so that you don’t have to.  I’ve advised numerous men and women on how to create, publish and market their books and in completing this project I will be able to broaden my audience and help more individuals achieve this goal. Let’s dive into exactly how I look to have people “check off” one of the world’s top goals of “creating and publishing a book” from their bucket list and to-do lists.


About the video series, the Kindle Publishing Playbook


Part 1  -  An Introduction & How You can become a publisher with no writing experience!

In the first set of videos in this series, I will start off by providing an overview and giving a brief explanation of the work that publishing a book entails.  You may be asking yourself, “Why Kindle?” which I cover in explicit detail to persuade my readers to actually follow through with this successful residual income powerhouse.  The history of Kindle is discussed alongside a general overview of Amazon’s amazing system, KDP Select.  This system allows publishers to promote their book successfully, given they have prepared accordingly for Amazon’s promotion system to boost their ranks and income in the long run.   

Part 2 - Creating Your Book; Picking a Niche,  Generating Ideas, Picking a Title, Writing or Outsourcing work, Format and Structure, Cover.

This second part of the video series will provide soon to be prosperous publishers with a thorough guide on how to generate ideas in the field they are passionate about or find suitable through the knowledge of analyzing market research which is discussed in-depth in the video series.  Furthermore, customers will learn how to create a catchy title on their content, outsourcing techniques if needed and much more. Additionally, the process of creating or outsourcing an appealing book cover and in what manner their book should be formatted to fit the popular kindle device is delivered to the customers.

This series will be popular in that many individuals may or may not have solidified ideas for books. Those who haven’t can start here in the series!


Part 3 - Publish Your Book –  Pen Name/Author Central, Description & Publishing Your Book, Categories, Pricing, Reviews, Sustaining Rank & Maintaining Sales, Dos & Dont’s

In the third part of the series, I will cover a plan of action over whether or not to use a pen name, and steps needed to boost their name and obtain a fan base.

This part will allow individuals that already have a book written to start here if they already have their book details covered. Regardless, the step by step approach taken by following these videos allows for ease when these upcoming publishers publish their book to the Kindle platform.

The action needed to write an attractive description , have appropriate pricing, category placement and most importantly, popular keywords will be covered in depth.

A common misconception is that you can publish your book and let Amazon take care of the rest. This will not work; the post publishing phase of this book describes methods of sustaining the rank and sales of a book and giving the book proper maintenance.  Do’s and Don’t’s are delivered based on not only my experience, but the experience of many other established publishers.  A compilation of essential resources will be provided to every customer in addition.

Part 4 –  Marketing Your Book – In Amazon Marketing, Outside Marketing

The secrets behind internal and external marketing during the pre-publishing and post-publishing phases will be touched on greatly in a simple, easy to implement strategy.

This is one of the most essential parts of the publishing strategy!  From free and paid promotion, to social media, blogs, backlinks, forums, article writing, email lists, press releases, and more, this is an all encompassing guide that will impress even the most experienced marketers.

Part 5 - Advanced Techniques

The advanced techniques part of this video series is an all encompassing guide containing over 20 methods that have helped my books skyrocket in sales and exposure in past years. These techniques are extremely unique to this book series and may have you saying “Why couldn’t I think of that”?

This video series will be the prized possession of the series and will be extremely popular throughout the UDemy platform (more on this later!).

Other Included Elements

In addition to what I will be covering in the parts above, I will be explaining the importance of evergreen content, how I stay organized, how to publish the actual book on the KDP platform and set up and email list, and much more. 

Similarly, I will be including explanations of the anatomy of Amazon, how your book is found, and why marketing and social proof is important. I will touch on the future of publishing and provide a list of resources that details every URL explained in the video series. 

Lastly, the video series will contain a full five minute recap of the entire series, will contain advanced checklists to help in publishing, and will contain any miscellaneous information.


Why is this Video Series Unique?

This is tremendously unique because of the video series’ ability to teach publishers how to establish a symbiotic relationship between themselves and Amazon while spreading books they are passionate about.  No other series of books on publishing or video series has rivaled my expertise on the subject.  I have an incredible amount of confidence in my strategy and its ability to help other publishers become successful.  

And the best part, this video series can teach anybody with no prior publishing experience! I’m confident that I’ve put in more heart, sweat and tears than most in the industry and I’d like to spread this knowledge throughout the world with your help.


Where Are You Going to Sell the Video Series? 

I will become a premium instructor on UDemy.com and create a course on Kindle. I will charge around $100-$197 for the video series/course, and I will be providing many extras to customers. 

Many of the existing Kindle courses can be very misleading, and do not provide what students really need to know. I'd like to combat that issue and create an extremely high quality course!



Where Your Contribution Will Go

  • Editing and Proofreading of PDF Documents
  • Cover Art
  • Video Editing
  • Designers
  • Promotional Costs (Expensive!)
  • Miscellaneous Video Creation Costs
  • Additional Extras for Course Takers
  • …and more!


To make this project a huge success, I am setting a goal for a minimum of $10,000+.


How Can You Help Support Me?

Make a Contribution.  Click on ‘Contribute Now’ or one of the perk packages to the right. Funds raised from this campaign will go towards the Kindle Publishing Playbook video series .

Share the Message. If you know someone that will support my dream, or if you know someone that would spread the word about my project, please invite these people to join the Kindle Publishing Playbook movement.

Support How You Can - Have a set of skills or professional network that will be able to support me? Are you able to advise me in making this project a success? Please feel free to reach out to me at any time at michael.a.balmaceda@gmail.com. Any support is extremely appreciated!


About the Author – Michael Balmaceda

Mike Balmaceda is a 21-year old, motivated young professional with a desire to spread his dream of publishing to the world.

At the age of 19, Mike landed numerous job opportunities in IT with a Forbes 10 company and has been solidified in a full-time position with this company after Mike graduates from the University of Florida this upcoming year. No average college senior, Mike has worked for this Forbes 10 company in IT Security, Business Intelligence and ERP for over 75% of his college tenor. He has been recognized via selective awards, killer bonuses and business-wide recognitions for his performance and drive in his work. 

This testament to Mike’s hard work isn’t all – Mike is a Founder and the current External Vice President of Epsilon Sigma Alpha, a student organization on the University of Florida that raises money for St. Jude Children’s Research Hospital. This fundraising initiative of giving back to the community is very important to Mike after his mother was diagnosed with breast cancer years earlier. Epsilon Sigma Alpha has been coined as the #1 leading fundraising chapter for it’s “ESA <3’s St. Jude Campaign” which took place across over 60 campuses nationwide.

This isn’t all – As a hobby, Mike finds joy in the sport of boxing and also in publishing books in the business realm, his area of specialty. Mike has seen been coined a best-seller under numerous pen names and has helped many individuals publish books containing their passions and ideals.

Allow Mike the opportunity to continue to give back by funding this campaign!

Regardless of your decision to contribute, feel free to contact me at any time at michael.a.balmaceda@gmail.com.

Thank you!

story_txt:
Let me first thank you for taking the time to view my
campaign! 
My name is Mike Balmaceda and I will be explaining to you my dream of
creating the Kindle Publishing Playbook Video Series which will help anyone successfully
write and publish the book of their dreams.

What is Kindle
Publishing? Why is it Important?
  Kindle
Publishing is a proven system that gives anyone a shot at becoming a successful
author and publisher due to the publishing system and traffic that Amazon provides
to its products; given you have the skills to pull off writing and publishing a
book.  Given this, I’ve found much
success in the Kindle publishing system described in my video series and have shared
these methods to help many others spread their passion and stories worldwide.  It is also often considered fulfilling a life
goal when publishing a book containing ideals or stories that touch your heart
or you are passionate about.  Please
consider fulfilling my dream to help others spread their passions, dreams, and
stories through publishing. 


The Kindle Publishing Playbook Series and Why I’m creating it

  The
Kindle Publishing Playbook video series is a complete, comprehensive guide
to teach anyone, regardless of previous writing 
experience, publishing experience,  computer experience, or income, how to publish
a book step-by-step, successfully.  A
common misconception when publishing books surrounds the opinion that you need
a publisher or a very complex pre-launch plan. Wrong! The Kindle Publishing
Playbook Series contains multiple videos that take the reader through an introduction
of the platform, creating the book, self-publishing it, marketing their books,
and much more. Creating this will allow me to spread my story and unique methods
to a large audience, allowing more individuals the opportunity to write and
publish books and achieve financial success. I’ve read over 8000 pages of
content, watched over 50 hours of video, listened to over 25 hours of audio and
more. Combining to over 7 months of hard work, I’ve spent the time developing
the ultimate strategy so that you don’t have to.  I’ve advised numerous men and women on how to
create, publish and market their books and in completing this project I will be
able to broaden my audience and help more individuals achieve this goal. Let’s dive
into exactly how I look to have people “check off” one of the world’s top goals
of “creating and publishing a book” from their bucket list and to-do lists. 

About the video series, the Kindle Publishing Playbook


Part 1  -  An Introduction
& How You can become a publisher with no writing experience! 

In the first set of videos in this series, I will start off by
providing an overview and giving a brief explanation of the work that
publishing a book entails.  You may be
asking yourself, “Why Kindle?” which I cover in explicit detail to persuade my
readers to actually follow through with this successful residual income powerhouse.  The history
of Kindle is discussed alongside a general overview of Amazon’s amazing system, KDP Select. 
This system allows publishers to promote their book successfully, given
they have prepared accordingly for Amazon’s promotion system to boost
their ranks and income in the long run. 
 
Part 2 - Creating Your Book; Picking a Niche,  Generating Ideas, Picking a Title, Writing or
Outsourcing work, Format and Structure, Cover.
This second part of the video series will provide soon to be prosperous
publishers with a thorough guide on how to generate ideas in the field they are
passionate about or find suitable through the knowledge of analyzing market
research which is discussed in-depth in the video series.  Furthermore, customers will learn how to create
a catchy title on their content, outsourcing techniques if needed and much
more. Additionally, the process of creating or outsourcing an
appealing book cover and in what manner their book should be formatted to fit the
popular kindle device is delivered to the customers.
This series will be popular in that many individuals may or
may not have solidified ideas for books. Those who haven’t can start here in
the series!


Part 3 - Publish Your
Book –  Pen Name/Author Central,
Description & Publishing Your Book, Categories, Pricing, Reviews,
Sustaining Rank & Maintaining Sales, Dos & Dont’s

In the third part of the series, I will cover a plan of
action over whether or not to use a pen name, and steps needed to boost their
name and obtain a fan base.
This part will allow individuals that already have a book
written to start here if they already have their book details covered.
Regardless, the step by step approach taken by following these videos allows for
ease when these upcoming publishers publish their book to the Kindle platform.
The action needed to write an attractive description , have
appropriate pricing, category placement and most importantly, popular keywords
will be covered in depth. 
A common misconception is that you can publish your book and
let Amazon take care of the rest. This will not work; the post publishing phase
of this book describes methods of sustaining the rank and sales of a book and
giving the book proper maintenance.  Do’s
and Don’t’s are delivered based on not only my experience, but the experience
of many other established publishers.  A
compilation of essential resources will be provided to every customer in
addition.
Part 4 –  Marketing Your Book – In Amazon Marketing,
Outside Marketing

The secrets behind internal and external marketing during
the pre-publishing and post-publishing phases will be touched on greatly in a
simple, easy to implement strategy. 
This is one of the most essential parts of the publishing
strategy!  From free and paid promotion,
to social media, blogs, backlinks, forums, article writing, email lists, press
releases, and more, this is an all encompassing guide that will impress even
the most experienced marketers.

Part 5 - Advanced
Techniques

The advanced techniques part of this video series is an all
encompassing guide containing over 20 methods that have helped my books
skyrocket in sales and exposure in past years. These techniques are extremely
unique to this book series and may have you saying “Why couldn’t I think of
that”? 
This video series will be the prized possession of the series
and will be extremely popular throughout the UDemy platform (more on this later!).

Other Included Elements

In addition to what I will be covering in the parts above, I will be explaining the importance of evergreen content, how I stay organized, how to publish the actual book on the KDP platform and set up and email list, and much more. 
Similarly, I will be including explanations of the anatomy of Amazon, how your book is found, and why marketing and social proof is important. I will touch on the future of publishing and provide a list of resources that details every URL explained in the video series. 
Lastly, the video series will contain a full five minute recap of the entire series, will contain
advanced checklists to help in publishing, and will contain any miscellaneous
information.

Why is this Video Series Unique?
This is tremendously unique because
of the video series’ ability to teach publishers how to establish a symbiotic
relationship between themselves and Amazon while spreading books they are
passionate about.  No other series of
books on publishing or video series has rivaled my expertise on the subject.  I have an incredible amount of confidence in
my strategy and its ability to help other publishers become successful.  
And the
best part, this video series can teach anybody with no prior publishing experience! I’m
confident that I’ve put in more heart, sweat and tears than most in the
industry and I’d like to spread this knowledge throughout the world with your
help.


Where Are You Going to Sell the Video Series? 
I will become a premium instructor on UDemy.com and create a course on Kindle. I will charge around $100-$197 for the video series/course, and I will be providing many extras to customers. 
Many of the existing Kindle courses can be very misleading, and do not provide what students really need to know. I'd like to combat that issue and create an extremely high quality course!


Where Your
Contribution Will Go



Editing and Proofreading of PDF Documents


Cover Art


Video Editing

Designers


Promotional Costs (Expensive!)


Miscellaneous Video Creation Costs

Additional Extras for Course Takers

…and more!




To make this project a huge success, I am setting a goal for
a minimum of $10,000+. 

How Can You Help
Support Me?
Make a Contribution.  Click on ‘Contribute Now’ or one of the
perk packages to the right. Funds raised from this campaign will go towards the
Kindle Publishing Playbook video series . 
Share the Message.
If you know someone that will support my dream, or if you know someone that
would spread the word about my
project, please invite these people to join the Kindle Publishing Playbook
movement.
Support How You Can - Have a set of skills or professional network that will be able to support me? Are you able to advise me in making this project a success? Please feel free to reach out to me at any time at michael.a.balmaceda@gmail.com. Any support is extremely appreciated!

About the Author –
Michael Balmaceda



Mike Balmaceda is a 21-year old, motivated young
professional with a desire to spread his dream of publishing to the world.
At the age of 19, Mike landed numerous job opportunities in
IT with a Forbes 10 company and has been solidified in a full-time position
with this company after Mike graduates from the University of Florida this upcoming
year. No average college
senior, Mike has worked for this Forbes 10 company in IT Security, Business
Intelligence and ERP for over 75% of his college tenor. He has been recognized
via selective awards, killer bonuses and business-wide recognitions for his
performance and drive in his work. 

This testament to Mike’s hard work isn’t all – Mike is a
Founder and the current External Vice President of Epsilon Sigma Alpha, a student
organization on the University of Florida that raises money for St. Jude
Children’s Research Hospital. This fundraising initiative of giving back to the
community is very important to Mike after his mother was diagnosed with breast
cancer years earlier. Epsilon Sigma Alpha has been coined as the #1 leading
fundraising chapter for it’s “ESA <3’s St. Jude Campaign” which took place
across over 60 campuses nationwide. 
This isn’t all – As a hobby, Mike finds joy in the sport of
boxing and also in publishing books in the business realm, his area of
specialty. Mike has seen been coined a best-seller under numerous pen names and
has helped many individuals publish books containing their passions and ideals.

Allow Mike the opportunity to continue to give back by
funding this campaign!
Regardless of your decision to contribute, feel free to contact me at any time at michael.a.balmaceda@gmail.com.
Thank you! 




I Need Your
Support!
To turn my dream into a reality, I need your support. By
pledging for one of my perk packages or sharing the story with your family,
friends, or connections, you make a huge impact in the intellectual world you
live in. 
Please consider fulfilling my dream to help others spread their
passions, dreams, and stories through publishing. – Select a perk in the right
column that is best for you. 

From the bottom of my heart, THANK YOU!!!

story:
The purpose of FORESHADOW: A Serial YA Anthology is to offer a unique new online venue for young adult short stories, with a commitment to showcasing underrepresented voices, boosting emerging writers, and highlighting the beauty and power of YA fiction. Each month for the year of 2019, we will publish a new issue featuring three stellar YA stories. Among these will be original work from acclaimed writers, plus brand-new voices you haven’t heard from before who have been specially selected by your favorite authors.

Everything will be published on our website to be read for free by anyone in the world.

As foreshadowing in storytelling is a way of imagining and prefiguring what’s to come, we hope that the new writers you’ll discover in our serial anthology will be authors whose books you’ll covet tomorrow. We are especially committed to finding stories by marginalized voices new to YA and will be actively working on outreach, hoping to contribute to the changing landscape of young adult publishing to become more inclusive and diverse.

TL;DR: We're aiming to launch a project that shows by example how diverse the publishing industry can be, from the staff behind the curtain to the talented writers being published.

 


We worked hard to push this issue live so that you could get an idea of what to expect. The rest of the project will launch in January. We'll publish a new issue every month until the end of 2019, completing the anthology with Issue 12.

 

WE WANT TO PAY EVERYONE

 

Too often, creatives are told that they have to give away their work for free when they're in the beginning stages of building their careers. This is especially true of art that is shared on the internet.

We call BS. Our priority is to pay the authors being published for the first time just as much money as the rockstar authors whose names you already know. And we hope to raise even more than we need for that, so that we can also give our amazing volunteer staff honorariums to thank them for their amazing work.

Remember the part of the project where we have some of your favorite authors judging and selecting our brand-new voices? We're offering those authors honorariums to thank them for their time, so we need money for that, too.

 

ADDITIONAL COSTS

 

Aside from paying contributors, there are many hidden costs behind this project, including website hosting and security, marketing and advertising, legal consultation, photography, taxes on whatever amount we raise, and other operation costs—the list goes on.

We're setting a campaign goal of $16,000, but if we're being honest, we would love to raise way more than that. We'd love to be able to pay authors an amount that's competitive with the compensation they would receive for inclusion in a collection published by a major house. And we'd be thrilled to be able to give our volunteer staff members honorariums that make a bigger statement.

If the amount seems high, remember that we're making it free for anyone with internet access to read these stories. We don't have a paywall or saleable item to help balance costs.

We'd be grateful to receive any amount. To thank you for your contribution, we have some amazing gifts lined up on the right side of this page—be sure to check them out!

 

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

 

Can't contribute, but want to support us? Please spread the word about our fundraising campaign!

And tell your friends and communities of writers to polish up their young adult short stories and submit to us. We want to read their work!
 

WHO ARE WE?

 

Two New York Times bestselling YA authors—and an amazing team of 25 others—are behind this project! The co-creators and co-editors-in-chief of FORESHADOW: A Serial YA Anthology are Emily X.R. Pan (author of The Astonishing Color of After, and previously the founding editor-in-chief of Bodega Magazine) and Nova Ren Suma (author of The Walls Around Us, and faculty member at VCFA).

We both hold MFA degrees, during which time we worked behind-the-scenes on traditional print literary journals—and both our first publications were short stories in such magazines. Now, with FORESHADOW, we hope to offer an opportunity like that to new writers in the YA field. You can find out more about us and our amazing volunteer staff of editors, readers, and more on our website.

 

 

YOU SHOULD SUBMIT A STORY

 

Short stories are an amazing way to pin down the characters and peaks of something that could eventually become something longer. Challenge yourself to tell the full arc of a story in a short piece as a way to sharpen those storytelling skills—and then send it to us. We want to read your work!

Plus, did you know that it's common for literary agents to read short stories in order to scout out new talent? There are many writers who found representation because of their short work before they had the chance to finish a novel. A lot of agents are already following FORESHADOW—we hope we'll help them find new clients.

Check out our submission guidelines by clicking here. We are actively looking for new stories, and our next deadlines are September 1st and November 1st. Add them to your calendar!

 

Help us reach our stretch goal—just $8000 more! If our Indiegogo campaign can hit a total of $24,000 by September 15th, we will:

— Publish a bonus issue of FORESHADOW that's comprised of ALL New Voices.
— Be able to pay all our contributors a more competitive rate.
— Be able to pay all our staff members an honorarium.
— Offer a program to mentor THREE marginalized people who are interested in working in publishing and don't have any experience yet.

We're extra excited about that last point: Both Emily and Nova have backgrounds working for Big Five publishers. Behind the curtain, FORESHADOW is structured like a hybrid between a publisher and a magazine, and these mentees would have the opportunity to do a deep dive into seeing how each department works.

 

We want to thank you for your support! Below are some additional details on what we're offering. (There are also some details that will appear when you click on one of the perks on the right.)

 

SWAG:

These die-cut FORESHADOW stickers are 4.3"x3" and made with a laminate finish to protect them from weather and scratching.



This 1.25 inch enamel pin is our shout to the world. These are die struck iron pins, with a black rubber clutch on the back of each one for security and comfort.

The spiral bound notebook is 5"x7" with a plastic cover and ruled pages...and exactly the thing you should use for drafting the short story you'll send to FORESHADOW!

FORESHADOW's official tote bag is a 100% cotton canvas tote with gusseted sides and 22-inch handles. The dimensions: 10.5" x 14" x 5". Sturdy and stylish—perfect for carrying your favorite books.

 

BOOK BUNDLES:

 

Each GRAB BAG bundle of books that we're offering is different. We won't ruin the surprise and tell you what's in each tote, but we do want to thank the authors who donated titles in order to make these rewards possible:

Arvin Ahmadi (@arvinahmadi)
Samira Ahmed (@sam_aye_ahm)

We're also grateful to the following publishers and agencies for supporting FORESHADOW by offering their books for our campaign rewards:

Algonquin Young Readers (@AlgonquinYR)
Barry Goldblatt Literary (@barrygoldblatt)
Gallt & Zacker Literary Agency (@@AgentZacker

Root Literary (@rootliterary)

 

CALLS:

 

We're lucky that so many brilliant people from the publishing industry have donated their time in support of FORESHADOW.

The way it'll work: You pick the type of call you want, and then AFTER you've done that, you fill out the respective form to submit your preferences. We'll have you rank the agents/editors you want to speak to in order of greatest priority, and then we'll consider each entry on a first-come, first-served basis. Is there an agent or editor you're dying to speak to? Don't waste any time—grab that perk and submit that form now!

 

The agents offering QUERY CRITIQUE calls:

Fill out this form AFTER you've paid for your perk to rank your preferences for the above agents.

 

The agents offering PICK-THEIR-BRAIN calls:

(Note that these are only phone calls for you to ask questions; agents are not reading your work or offering critiques. Call will be scheduled at a date mutually agreed upon by both parties, and content of the call will be at the discretion of the agent.)

The editors offering PICK-THEIR-BRAIN calls:

Don't forget to look at the other perks, too!

There are a few one-off items that we think are pretty special. Take a look by scrolling through the list on the right! Click on them to read more info—those descriptions should tell you everything you need to know.

 

 

Perks will be coordinated / fulfilled after we finish this fundraising campaign. Thanks for your patience!

story:
Do you love reading horror, dark fantasy, steampunk and science fiction? Be a part of the indie author revolution by helping fund 2012 fiction projects.

Naked Snake Press is a small publisher of up and coming and veteran authors of genre fiction. We strive to produce quality genre fiction that is a step beyond what you'll find on the shelves of your chain bookseller. Our work is edgier, sexier, and filled with twists and turns, not cliches. We publish what readers want, not what big-time publishers "think" readers want.

Contributions go to pay our awesome authors, cover artists and editors, so we can continue to bring quality fiction to our readers.

story:
Satchel Willoughby is a distraught young boy who has lost something dear to himself. After searching everywhere in vain, he is told there is a place where all lost things go. Satchel ventures out to discover this place. What he discovers is a world full of more than I could describe here!

My goal is to raise enough money to pay for the illustrations/pressing of this book. I’ve worked on the story for several years & have been encouraged that it should become a Pixar film! So i figured I should start here first.

The illustrations will be provided by Vesper Porter Stamper. She is an amazing illustrator (& songwriter on The Sounds Familyre label). Here is a link to see her work. http://www.vespersongs.com

Imagine if C.S. Lewis, Tolkein, Tim Burton, L.Frank Baum, & Dr. Seuss went to an English pub together. That is Satchel Willoughby.

story:
Story of My Book

Swine is a book about intellectual struggles, human hypocrisy’s harmful effects on those within society, and questioning the existence of morals.

My name is Monica Vogel and I am the author of Swine. I wrote this book because of a combined passion for creative writing and a deep interest in philosophy.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will be challenged to consider the various inconsistencies in common human ideals. I want you to see this book as an opportunity to learn alongside Wesley Harris the idea of intellectual dissatisfaction faced by many in modern society, and find some hope in his triumph over similar obstacles.

Set in a fictional town in Montana, Swine is about serial killer Jack Webster, who turns each victim into a work of macabre art. Each display has deep meaning, and detectives Howard Swinton and Wesley Harris must figure them out in order to catch him. But when Swinton, a sore team player, alienates Harris for being a rookie, Harris is drawn into a relationship with Jack. As the story progresses and his convictions develop, Harris must determine whose side he’s really on, struggling with the question not just of how to catch the killer, but whether he wants the killer to be caught in the first place.

You will love this book if you are a fan of murder thrillers, enjoy complex philosophical questions, and love psychology, particularly analyzing the interaction of emotions and logic in the brain.

Swine speaks to fans of horror and thrillers who want to grapple with murder and morality in a new way.

Ultimately, I hope that Swine inspires reflection and fruitful dialogue, pressing into engaging questions like:

  • How does logical hypocrisy affect people in society?
  • Do morals actually exist, or are they merely a made-up set of rules with no real basis?
  • How can one balance their emotions with logic in decision-making?

I look forward to exploring these questions and beyond with my readers. I believe discussing these themes will change us all for the better.

 

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

  • The editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in August, 2021.

  • The cover design of my book. (The mock-ups you see currently are a placeholder!)

  • The layout design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).

  • The copy editing for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.

  • The launch & promotion efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this fall.

When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish a paperback and ebook. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover and an audio book.

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish.

  • Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book.

  • You will receive early access to the Author’s Note and other excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback.

  • You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.

  • You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.

  • And much more!

 

About the Author

Monica Vogel is a student researcher at the University of Chicago, studying linguistics and Chinese culture. She is passionate about language and psychology as a whole, having presented research in the areas of cybersecurity, cognitive science, and Chinese culture alike, while also publishing several creative works, primarily horror and poetry.

Monica was decided to write this book because of her passion for asking deep philosophical and psychological questions. She found initial inspiration in the serial killer H. H. Holmes, then combined that with her interest in emotional decision making, human hypocrisy, and intellectual dissatisfaction within society.

Monica spends her free time throwing axes, reading about severely endangered languages, writing poetry, and doing research on a variety of subjects in the realm of psychology, particularly paraphilias and their comorbidities. She has an obsession with making puns and is also an avid reader of works in both English and Chinese.

For more information, you can connect with Monica at mjvogel@uchicago.edu and on the following social networks: Facebook, LinkedIn, Instagram (@intellectualoddball), Twitter (@OverlyOdd), and her author website (intellectualoddball.com).
 

International Pre-orders

For international pre-orders, please send me a private message.

 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by including the cost of mailing and shipping the signed copies into each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we ship the pre-order rewards to you as early as possible. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as to when my book will publish. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.
 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Please share my pre-sale campaign on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and LinkedIn with your friends, family, and network. Please use #SwineNovel and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so we can help amplify your efforts.
  • You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page.
  • Please share my book with five friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it via text or direct message on social media.

Thank you so much for of all of your support!

Thanks again,
Monica Vogel

story:
¿Qué?

No aprendas de mí nos ofrece un relato fascinante acerca de las tribulaciones de un artista en uno momento muy complejo de nuestra historia más reciente.

En el año 1935, el protagonista, al ser reclutado para servir al ejército republicano, prometió lealtad a su bandera. Pasado menos de un año de esa promesa, acatando órdenes de los generales sublevados, se vio obligado a luchar contra el ejército al que perteneció y al que prometió lealtad. La sensibilidad artística de un músico como él, le sirvió para aislarse en el mundo que creó para sí, donde la norma fundamental del comportamiento era la no implicación, el no entrar en conflictos. Para ello, intentó alejarse de todos los acontecimientos que le sobrevenían, los desagradables e incluso los agradables que pudieran obligarle a contraer algún compromiso. Todo un universo ficticio construido para eludir sus propias fatalidades y problemas, y, de igual forma soportar las grandes tragedias que a diario se
producían en la guerra civil.
          Al aparecer en la novela un antagonista, también artista, en este caso pintor, se crea una nueva dualidad, porque coincidiendo en los aspectos fundamentales del porqué de la situación que les había tocado sobrellevar, lo diametral de sus temperamentos, hace que esa incipiente relación le haga descubrir al protagonista aspectos de la amistad que no conocía, y lo conducen a intentar salir del aislamiento que se había diseñado. Como consecuencia descubrirá entornos más agradables y placenteros. Para corregir esta deriva, tiene que enfrentarse y superar las distintas situaciones que le toca vivir y que le harán recomponer el resto de sus días.

¿Quiénes?

Tandaia es una editorial con voluntad de cambio, de publicar obras poco convencionales pero de indudable calidad, con nuevas y refrescantes ideas como es el emplear una campaña preventa para promocionar cada título cuando esta todavía se encuentra en proceso de edición.

De este modo eres tú, ahora que te estás planteando cómo colaborar, el que decide si la obra que te presentamos verá la luz pasando a formar parte de nuestro catálogo... porque consideramos al lector parte fundamental del proceso.

Hoy se nos presenta Adolfo Valderas.

Nací y me eduqué en Cádiz, pero por distintas circunstancias he vivido, estudiado y trabajado en otras latitudes durante más de treinta años. No por eso he dejado de tener un estrecho contacto con sus habitantes, familiares y amigos. Ahora he vuelto, espero que para siempre.
          Hoy tengo el tiempo necesario para mostraros esta novela que siempre estuvo en mi particular «carpeta de proyectos». En ella intento mezclar al personajes central con otros conocidos y recordados, siempre situándolos en lugares y acontecimientos vividos por mí o tomados de los relatos e informaciones que me pasaron mis mayores. 
          A través de los años he descubierto que en la mayoría de los casos, la capacidad de aceptar o decidir define la personalidad del individuo. Los que han vivido en Cádiz, nacidos o no, tienden a unificarse en una determinada idiosincrasia a la que podríamos llamar, «talante gaditano». Esa filosofía de vida es el eje del comportamiento inicial del protagonista de esta novela.

¿Por qué?

Y por aquí una muestra de lo que encontraréis en sus páginas:

«Una tarde, de alguna manera, Romualdo consiguió el parte de las bajas producidas en el último mes, solo de su regimiento. Aquella noche, antes del toque de silencio, recostado en su litera leyendo una hoja rayada, llamó a Manuel: “Toma… comprueba todo lo que está ocurriendo… Toda esta tragedia, recogida en esta cuartilla, es el resultado del desinterés mostrado por nuestros gobernantes durante siglos, todo por la incultura, por los malos aprendizajes y la mala catalogación de los valores primordiales”. Subiendo el tono, casi en el umbral de la cólera: “Aquí tienes una lista con los muertos. Es el resultado de algo que no tengo capacidad para comprender. Todo debido a los extremismos de nuestros dirigentes”. Tras un largo silencio de ambos: “Tú desde tu pragmatismo, no te das cuenta que las capas populares, por miedo a las revoluciones y desordenes, están dispuestas a pagar con sus libertades”. Manuel quiso atemperarlo: “No es necesario que todos sepan cómo piensas, por favor, cálmate y baja el tono”.
          “¡Que me calme!, ¿pero no lo ves?, todos, en esa frustración y desesperanza,  terminan perdiendo de vista algo tan fundamental, algo que incluso preconizaba Jesús de Nazaret, y que la propia iglesia católica no ha sido capaz de transmitir a todos sus fieles”. Ya casi gritando: ¡”Nosotros somos Vosotros”!
          Todo el dormitorio se inundó de un prolongado murmullo. Entonces, oscilando la cabeza repetidas veces, y bajando el tono de su voz, a las repetidas instancias de Manuel, Romualdo sentenció: “Creo que no habrá solución si los seres humanos, no terminan viendo, que la única salida, pasa por comprendernos y fundamentalmente,  respetarnos.”Tras los susurros, el silencio de todos. Pasados unos segundos, Romualdo pontificó: “Pero los hombres seguiremos cayendo en las trampas de las ideologías y perdiendo las capacidades que otorga a otros la razón”. 
          Al final terminaban aceptando la situación y se sumía en un silencio monacal. Sin moverse, casi impertérrito, Manuel le invitaba a que procurase pasar lo más desapercibido posible, y que nada se le notase:”Piensa que el sueño de la razón produce monstruos. No lo digo yo, fue tu admirado Francisco de Goya”».

¿Cómo?

Para arrancar el proyecto nos hemos fijado como objetivo 880€; esta es la cantidad que recaudaríamos si alrededor de cincuenta mecenas se hiciesen, cada cual, con un ejemplar de esta primera edición; en caso de no alcanzar el objetivo, Indiegogo devuelve las contribuciones una vez finalizada la campaña, en torno a 5-10 días después, sin ningún tipo de gasto ni comisión.

  • Teniendo acceso a las galeradas de edición.
  • Recibiendo un ejemplar semanas antes de la salida al mercado de la obra.
  • Si bien, también podrías ver tu nombre en los agradecimientos aportando un poco más.

Aviso para navegantes: La opción BACK IT es únicamente para realizar donaciones a la edición, por lo que no habrá comunicaciones posteriores en busca de datos de envío... cualquiera de las opciones válidas de reserva exige cumplimentar formulario para poder servir el pedido.

Además...

Sabemos que son tiempos difíciles, también nosotros los sufrimos, y es posible que no te encuentres en disposición de apoyarnos con tu mecenazgo en estos momentos... pero esperamos que si esto te ha llegado al alma, incluso si tal vez conoces en persona al autor, trates de difundir esta campaña (facebook, twitter, blogger, boca-oreja... ) para que alcancemos nuestra meta y Adolfo Valderas vea publicada su obra.

Gracias por vuestro tiempo.

Política de Privacidad

Para corregir esta deriva, tiene que enfrentarse y superar las distintas situaciones que le toca vivir y que le harán recomponer el resto de sus días.
¿Quiénes?
Tandaia es una editorial con voluntad de cambio, de publicar obras poco convencionales pero de indudable calidad, con nuevas y refrescantes ideas como es el emplear una campaña preventa para promocionar cada título cuando esta todavía se encuentra en proceso de edición.
De este modo eres tú, ahora que te estás planteando cómo colaborar, el que decide si la obra que te presentamos verá la luz pasando a formar parte de nuestro catálogo... porque consideramos al lector parte fundamental del proceso.
Hoy se nos presenta Adolfo Valderas.
Nací y me eduqué en Cádiz, pero por distintas circunstancias he vivido, estudiado y trabajado en otras latitudes durante más de treinta años. No por eso he dejado de tener un estrecho contacto con sus habitantes, familiares y amigos. Ahora he vuelto, espero que para siempre.          Hoy tengo el tiempo necesario para mostraros esta novela que siempre estuvo en mi particular «carpeta de proyectos». En ella intento mezclar al personajes central con otros conocidos y recordados, siempre situándolos en lugares y acontecimientos vividos por mí o tomados de los relatos e informaciones que me pasaron mis mayores.           A través de los años he descubierto que en la mayoría de los casos, la capacidad de aceptar o decidir define la personalidad del individuo. Los que han vivido en Cádiz, nacidos o no, tienden a unificarse en una determinada idiosincrasia a la que podríamos llamar, «talante gaditano». Esa filosofía de vida es el eje del comportamiento inicial del protagonista de esta novela.
¿Por qué?
Y por aquí una muestra de lo que encontraréis en sus páginas:
«Una tarde, de alguna manera, Romualdo consiguió el parte de las bajas producidas en el último mes, solo de su regimiento. Aquella noche, antes del toque de silencio, recostado en su litera leyendo una hoja rayada, llamó a Manuel: “Toma… comprueba todo lo que está ocurriendo… Toda esta tragedia, recogida en esta cuartilla, es el resultado del desinterés mostrado por nuestros gobernantes durante siglos, todo por la incultura, por los malos aprendizajes y la mala catalogación de los valores primordiales”. Subiendo el tono, casi en el umbral de la cólera: “Aquí tienes una lista con los muertos. Es el resultado de algo que no tengo capacidad para comprender. Todo debido a los extremismos de nuestros dirigentes”. Tras un largo silencio de ambos: “Tú desde tu pragmatismo, no te das cuenta que las capas populares, por miedo a las revoluciones y desordenes, están dispuestas a pagar con sus libertades”. Manuel quiso atemperarlo: “No es necesario que todos sepan cómo piensas, por favor, cálmate y baja el tono”.          “¡Que me calme!, ¿pero no lo ves?, todos, en esa frustración y desesperanza,  terminan perdiendo de vista algo tan fundamental, algo que incluso preconizaba Jesús de Nazaret, y que la propia iglesia católica no ha sido capaz de transmitir a todos sus fieles”. Ya casi gritando: ¡”Nosotros somos Vosotros”!          Todo el dormitorio se inundó de un prolongado murmullo. Entonces, oscilando la cabeza repetidas veces, y bajando el tono de su voz, a las repetidas instancias de Manuel, Romualdo sentenció: “Creo que no habrá solución si los seres humanos, no terminan viendo, que la única salida, pasa por comprendernos y fundamentalmente,  respetarnos.”Tras los susurros, el silencio de todos. Pasados unos segundos, Romualdo pontificó: “Pero los hombres seguiremos cayendo en las trampas de las ideologías y perdiendo las capacidades que otorga a otros la razón”.           Al final terminaban aceptando la situación y se sumía en un silencio monacal. Sin moverse, casi impertérrito, Manuel le invitaba a que procurase pasar lo más desapercibido posible, y que nada se le notase:”Piensa que el sueño de la razón produce monstruos. No lo digo yo, fue tu admirado Francisco de Goya”».
¿Cómo?
Para arrancar el proyecto nos hemos fijado como objetivo 880€; esta es la cantidad que recaudaríamos si alrededor de cincuenta mecenas se hiciesen, cada cual, con un ejemplar de esta primera edición; en caso de no alcanzar el objetivo, Indiegogo devuelve las contribuciones una vez finalizada la campaña, en torno a 5-10 días después, sin ningún tipo de gasto ni comisión.

Teniendo acceso a las galeradas de edición.
Recibiendo un ejemplar semanas antes de la salida al mercado de la obra.
Si bien, también podrías ver tu nombre en los agradecimientos aportando un poco más.

Aviso para navegantes: La opción BACK IT es únicamente para realizar donaciones a la edición, por lo que no habrá comunicaciones posteriores en busca de datos de envío... cualquiera de las opciones válidas de reserva exige cumplimentar formulario para poder servir el pedido.
Además...
Sabemos que son tiempos difíciles, también nosotros los sufrimos, y es posible que no te encuentres en disposición de apoyarnos con tu mecenazgo en estos momentos... pero esperamos que si esto te ha llegado al alma, incluso si tal vez conoces en persona al autor, trates de difundir esta campaña (facebook, twitter, blogger, boca-oreja... ) para que alcancemos nuestra meta y Adolfo Valderas vea publicada su obra.
Gracias por vuestro tiempo.
Política de Privacidad

story:
Story of My Book

Sports, Drugs and Rock N' Roll is a book for the average American who wants to understand different converging aspects of the Opioid Crisis in an interesting way without the typically used jargon. Written at the intersection of the Crisis, sports medicine and popular culture, this book will make a reader an informed member of their community and hopefully an advocate for bringing an end to this devastating issue.

My name is Drew Musgrave and I am the author of Sports, Drugs and Rock N' Roll. I wrote this book because the Opioid Crisis has greatly affected my home state of Ohio and I could no longer stand idle as more of my fellow Americans slipped through the cracks of flawed policies and into the unrelenting grip of dependence.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover a few intricacies contributing to the multifaceted problem that is the Opioid Crisis as well as ways we can prevent them in the future. In this book, I hope to instill the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for public health and the importance of primary prevention in you. And then ultimately I want you to see this book as a tool to help in being an educated voter and active part in the health of your community.

In this book, you'll learn about famous cases of opioid misuse and how we as a society can learn from those times when the system failed the individual:
  • Elvis Presley - Stigma around mental health can become dangerous
  • Purdue Pharma - OxyContin beginning of the Epidemic as we know it today
  • Drew Brees - Greatness can be achieved if pain is managed responsibly
  • Mac Miller - We still have a far way to go with preventative policy

You will love this book if you are interested in healthcare, public policy, sports or good old rock n' roll.
Sports, Drugs and Rock N' Roll is a non-fiction book that speaks to anyone who wants to learn more about the Opioid Crisis in an interesting and incredibly accessible way. This book is meant to spark insightful living room conversations because it is my belief that those are the genesis of some of the greatest solutions to the most challenging problems to society.

 

The Book - Sports, Drugs and Rock N' Roll


The book is written in three Parts....

Part 1 contains the introduction + additional chapters that introduce the reader to Opioid Crisis and why opioids are so dangerous.

Part 2 contains a discussion of the effects the Opioid Crisis has had on shaping the course of history by taking influential individuals like Elvis Presley and Mac Miller before their times. It also discusses instances in which the healthcare system has been able to prevent such tragedies, such as with Super Bowl champion Drew Brees and multi-NBA Finals champion LeBron James.

Part 3 summarizes possible policy alternatives that could be put into place to prevent new cases of opioid dependence from occurring. Part 3 includes conversations and interviews done with leaders in both health-related government agencies and the healthcare system itself.

 

What I Need & What You'll Get


This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:
 
  • The Editor and I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in October, 2019
  • The Cover Design of my Book - the mockups you see currently are a placeholder!
  • The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, Ebook Formats)
  • The Copyediting for My Book - to make help polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication
  • The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book - when I ultimately publish this fall
  • When I pre-sell 100 copies of my book, I will publish. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish an audiobook. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition.

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish
  • A Personal, handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering my book
  • Your Name will appear in a Special, Acknowledgements Section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”)
  • Early access to the Introduction of my Book and my entire manuscript, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback
  • The opportunity to help give me feedback and be involved in selecting my cover
  • I will do a book topic/workshop seminar where I will share experience the experiences of writing my book
  • And more...

About the Author


I am a rising senior at Georgetown University. A pre-medical student, I am finishing a degree in Healthcare Management and Policy in the spring of 2020. As a published tissue engineering and regenerative medicine researcher, in writing this book I have turned my attention to another infirmity that is plaguing the nation.

I wrote this book for every fellow American who is currently caught in the grips of addiction as well as all those who will be if actions are not taken to improve preventative policy. By presenting the problem and possible solutions in an accessible and interesting way, I hope to spark conversations that will impassion people to actively pursue the instatement of such policies.

Certifiably the world's worst passenger side navigator, I find simple pleasures in a bold cup of coffee, spending time with my dogs and watching The Ohio State Buckeyes beat Michigan in November.

For more information you can connect with Drew at ajm343@georgetown.edu.

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:
  • Please Share my Pre-sale Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #ROCKitforward and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press so we can help amplify your efforts.
  • You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page
  • Please share my book to 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or Direct Message on social media.

Thank you so much of all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
Drew Musgrave

story:
About The Book

NEW!!!  This is the follow up to Simone Spence's second book - "Deadbeats, What Responsible Parents Need to Know About Collecting Child Support". 

·  Written by Simone Spence, founder of Child Support Solutions, LLC.

·  More than $11 million in child support collected.

·  More than 10,000 parents and their children helped.

·  Learn how to find hidden income and assets.

·  Find any deadbeat and get them served.

·  Determine if he’s a deadbeat…. Is he

·  Self-employed…

·  quasi-employed…

·  working under the table…

·  …or just blowing you off

·  …or is he deadbroke and just can’t pay?

·  What to do to protect your children and yourself in either situation.

You need this book if

·  You are owed arrears and the “system” can’t find him, find his income or garnish his wages.

·  She short-changes you every month.  She’s supposed to pay you $500 but only pays $300 and she gets away with it

·  He knows how to manipulate the system to make it appear as though he earns less than he does

·  She lies to the court about her income

·  He hides assets.  Cash is not in his name, the car he drives is not in his name, the house he lives in is not in his name.  He is broke.  On paper.  Somehow he lives like a king.

·  He truly is penniless

 

Want To Be Part of A National Movement To Make The World A Better Place for Children?

 In this next video, Simone describes the chapters in the book - many which you can identify with.

 

 




 

Here's How You Can Help:

  • MAKE A CONTRIBUTION.  Click on 'Contribute now' or choose one of the perk  packages on the right. Funds raised from this campaign will go towards our first production run of Deadbeat vs. Deadbroke, including publishing, design, marketing, promotions, book tour and launch party.  If we exceed our contribution request, we will print additional copies which will be provided at no cost to parents who really need them such as women in domestic violence shelters and homeless shelters with their children.  Statistics show that the majority of women in these conditions fled from partners who have jobs and who can financially support their children. 
  • JOIN THE COMMUNITY. The focus of child support is on kids and we have launched the Focus on Kids 1st Movement to advance this cause.  As a supporter of the Focus on Kids 1st Movement, you will be a part of the community.  You will receive regular updates on parents who are achieving success and are propelling their families into new and better directions.  This book literally has the power to help parents and children get off of social services because the other parent is now doing their share and has to power to help parents to save their homes so that their children have a place to live because they can now pay their mortgage with money owed to them.  Pay attention.  Read the stories.  They will be heart-warming and you will know that you have done the right thing by helping all that you can. 
  • SHARE THE MESSAGE.  If you share the same dream that I do, or if you know someone who does, or know someone - who knows someone who does... or might...please spread the word!  Invite your family, friends, neighbors and networks to join the Focus on Kids 1st Movement.  Share by email, share on social networks, blog about it.... however you choose to do it, please just do.  The kids are depending on you.

story:
Update 12/07/2011

Many Thanks for helping us reach our published goal! My long term need is $2400, so if you planned on contributing or pre-ordering, you can still do it before the end of the campaign, as the funds will still be used exclusively for paying the illustrator on this project... Thanks again!.

 

Our Story

I have been writing fiction for 25 years. Some good, some bad, some normal, some weird...For the past two years, I have actually felt comfortable enough to share it. 

Also during this time, I have been lucky enough to be the father of four kids ranging from 16 down to 6. 

 

The time has finally come for these two worlds to meet...

The result is my first children's book, a bedtime story about the source of children's energy. This book is short, easy to read to a child, and humorous.

 

Good thing- I could write it.

Bad Thing- I cannot draw.

 

So....I am raising money, or trying to, to help fund the illustrations that will accompany my text. Any extra money will be used in the publication process, either in upgraded paper, or marketing.

 

Click here for my video which begs for your assistance: http://www.xtranormal.com/watch/12543243

The Impact

The Energy Thief is a children's book. There will not be a significant cultural impact because of it's release... the seas will not part, plagues will not end and I cannot fix the economy because of your support.

 What your support will allow me to do is complete this project the way I envision it- which will hopefully also provide a small amount of entertainment to you and your child at the end of a day.

 

If it does not get fully funded through this indigogo campaign, I will simply keep pushing forward....but it sure would be great to do it right. 

I will use whatever money IS raised to illustrate what I can, then perhaps reshape the book to fit those illustrations....Who knows, maybe I will draw some stick figures for the unfunded portion!

 

What We Need & What You Get

I plan on using the money to pay an illustrator to either embellish the ideas I have, or create a world to accompany the rhyming couplets I have created. To those who support this campaign, I will give names in a credits page, copies of the book, hand-signed editions and copies of my other fiction.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word. If you cannot give, tell someone else. Also- look at all the campaigns on this site- pretty cool stuff out there.
